1.content:
A tiny blonde woman awoke with a start from a sleep filled with dangers and uncertainty. She looked around her surroundings. Eyes darting wide at any movement. But it was dimly lit where she was. Looking she saw furniture and a room. She sat upright on a bed half covered in a blanket. But everything was too large for her height. The bed was large... the dresser and nightstand were too big for someone her size. It was then that she remembered the events the day before and how she came to be here. She remembered waking weeks ago with no memory of who she was or how she came to be in a world that was enormous to her. She woke one day in the woods a mere three inches tall and naked. No memory of who she was but a strong sense that she was not always tiny. For weeks she survived on nothing but grass and anything else she convinced herself wouldn't kill her. There was an entire day and a half where she couldn't eat a thing because she chose wrong and the plant she ate made her vomit until she was dry heaving. When initially she woke she was a little on the overweight side, but such a long stretch of almost no nourishment had stripped her down to her current slender self. She hid from any wandering animal now gargantuan to her. One day she fought off a bird who mistook her for a mouse. In the end she wasn't badly hurt once the bird realized it had no idea what it actually was trying to eat and flew off.

She made it a habit of working her way in one direction in hopes of reaching civilization. Sleeping in small holes or under the brush of fallen leaves. Eventually she reached a borderland where the grass forest ended and shorter foliage started. That was when she saw her first giant. Or more accurately when the first giant noticed her as she was preoccupied with foraging for food when the giant shadow fell over her. She turned to see two massive feet and towering legs straddling her tiny form on the ground. In an instant the huge mountain of body fell with an earth shaking rumble as the giant fell to it's knees for a closer look at her. She started to run but, weak with hunger, stumbled and fell. She turned onto her back and fended herself with her hands as she looked upon the face of her pursuer. It was a child. A young girl stared back at her with her eyes wide and a slow smile growing on her face. She was young. Very young by her estimations. The girl had dark hair that went below her shoulders and chestnut colored eyes that gleamed with the new discovery. The giant reached her hand down slowly and as the tiny woman shielded her face with her arms and hands. She felt huge fingers gently wrap themselves around her.... engulfing her in warmth and the faint scent of the flowers she was picking. She then felt the vertigo of being raised high into the air and she let out a small whimper at her helplessness. She felt herself being carried for miles by her ratio before she heard doors opening and closing and the padded sound of feet on stairs and another door shutting.

The fingers opened and the little woman sat up in the middle of the giant hand and stared back at a huge smiling face. Realizing her nudity in the presence of another person after weeks alone, she covered herself up with her hands. The giant girl blushed and looked away momentarily before her eyes slowly returned. The girl lowered her hand to her desk and tilted it slightly implying for the tiny passenger to disembark. The small woman crawled to the edge of the palm and stepped down onto the desk never taking her eyes off the giant. The girl giggled as her new find obeyed her unspoken command before she stomped over to her toy chest and began to dig around. The tiny woman walked around the desk top trying to decide if it was wise to make an attempt to run. She reached the edge and looked down and almost fell backwards from the vertigo.

The giant girl returned and the woman scurried back from the edge. Giant fingers lowered something and dangled it in front of the woman. Bewildered but curious, the tiny person reached up and grasped it and the fingers let it go. Holding it out in front of her she saw it was a shirt, but a really big shirt. It had the words "Girl Power" written in it. She cautiously pulled it over her head and let it drape down her small body. Even though it was just a shirt it was like a short dress on her. As she stood taking it in she was startled by the sound of the giant girl clapping her hands.

"I knew it'd fit!" the giant girl finally broke their silence. Leaning down for a closer look at her little prize she asked, "How come you're so small?" The tiny woman stood quiet and stared back at the enormous child. "What's your name?", the girl asked. Still nothing escaped the frightened woman's throat. "My name's Ellie."

"H-hello...Ellie." she finally replied. Ellie gasped hearing the tiny woman's voice for the first time.

"Your voice sounds so high and tiny." Ellie giggled. "Are you a fairy?!" The woman shook her head, but to be honest for all she knew she could be. "But you're sooo tiny..", the girl pointed out. "How did you get so little?"

The woman stood, her small hands wringing the hem of her shirt dress in a fit of frustration. "I-....I don't know", she admitted. She told the girl about her waking with no memory and of the trials she went through just to survive the woods. As the poor woman told her tale the wide smile on Ellie's face faded and was replaced with concern as she heard what her new found friend had went through. When the woman was finished she stumbled back and sat down on the edge of a book on Ellie's desk and was fighting back tears at the uncertainty of her situation.
1.title: It Begins...

11.content:
"That's so sad", Ellie comforted. "You poor little thing..." The little woman stood up and adjusted her shirt dress, trying to put up a strong front in the eyes of a child, giant or not. "Well... you're safe with me now", Ellie informed her. "I can take really good care of you. Honest." The little woman wasn't sure if she liked the sound of the finality of the girl's decision to keep her. She may have traded the many unknown dangers of the wild for the dangers of one massive child.

"If you can't remember your name, we need one till you do. Ok?" The little woman looked up at Ellie's smiling face and nodded with a weak smile. "Hmm... how about...", Ellie sat with her face in concentration. Her nose scrunched in deep thought. "I know! How about Polly?"

The small woman looked at the giant girl confused. "W-why Polly?" she asked.

"You know....", Ellie said as she looked around the floor of her room before coming back and standing one of her toys next to the small woman on the desk. "..like Polly Pocket." The woman looked at the toy next to her. It was a child's doll that was roughly the same size as she was. It was bizarre to see a girl's doll at such a massive size. It put her condition into a whole new perspective... that she was nothing more than a child's toy now. That thought made her nervous as she looked up at Ellie who was grinning from ear to ear.

"Ok...", the newly named Polly agreed.

"I'm sorry none of her clothes will work for you, Polly." She understood, as the interchangeable clothes for the toy line were nothing more than hard plastic.

"It's getting pretty late," Ellie said as she fought off a yawn and failed. "You can sleep in Barbie's house tonight." Ellie pointed at the dollhouse on her floor across the room. "She has a nice soft bed. I have a Polly Pocket playset but it's all hard plastic and stuff." Ellie lowered her hand to the desk palm up near Polly. The little woman nervously looked up at Ellie who smiled down at her. The bigger the girl grinned, Polly noticed she was missing a baby tooth. She looked at the giant hand and walked to it and climbed up onto it and sat very still in the middle as Ellie lifted her up.

The girl stood admiring the little adult in her hand from every angle. "You're so pretty," she cooed. Polly blushed and looked away embarrassed. She imagined Ellie was being polite, as she was still covered in grim and dirt from being in the woods for so long. Done admiring her new little friend, Ellie walked across the room and knelt down and opened the wall of the dollhouse. Polly watched as the hand she sat on was advancing on what appeared to be the bedroom. She couldn't help but notice how huge even this seemed to her. A dollhouse that was made for dolls four times her size. Ellie's hand came to rest on the dollhouse floor and Polly crawled off and stood in another giant room. All the furniture was gigantic to her. She walked over to the bed and saw climbing into it was going to be a chore. She looked back and saw Ellie watching her. Polly didn't want to have to ask a child to help her get into a dollhouse bed, so she reached up and grabbed the blanket and struggled on her own. She could hear Ellie trying to cover her giggles as Polly's legs frantically flailed around trying to find a foothold to hoist herself up. Then she felt something touch her rump. With a squeal Polly felt Ellie's finger push her up and on top of the mattress. Polly turned disheveled to face Ellie, her face red with embarrassment.

"Sorry... I just wanted to help." Ellie apologized between giggles. Polly simply smiled back as she scooted towards the head of the bed. Ellie's giant hand returned and lifted the blanket up and Polly settled against the pillow and the giant hand lowered back down the blanket and tucked her in. "There... all comfy." Polly smiled back as she wiggled herself under the warm doll's blanket. "You're so cute in that bed." Ellie giggled again. "It's so big for you... maybe tomorrow we can figure something better for you, Ok?"

"It's ok, Ellie... this is very nice." Polly grinned back. Just happy to be anywhere safer than the woods.

The giant girl looked in on her little friend with her chin resting in her hand. "I'm gonna keep you a secret." Ellie informed Polly. "I have an older sister... Jenna. She'd just want to take you and make you hers." Polly heard this and she didn't know what this Jenna was like but she imagined it might be better with Ellie. "And my mom... she'd just make you go away or something." Ellie said with concern easily evident on her face. "But they won't find you...", she said. Almost to convince herself out loud. "Well... sleep tight, Polly." She said as she kissed her fingertip and gently touched Polly's cheek, making the tiny woman smile and wince away.

The giant girl slowly moved the dollhouse wall back into place and left Polly alone in the giant room. It was surreal for Polly as she lay there and she could see through the window the giant form of the girl moving around the room outside. But then the light switched off and she could hear the giant getting into bed. As Polly lay in bed recounting the events of the past weeks and her current situation it was enough to make her dizzy. But soon she could hear the light snoring from Ellie, and the sound made Polly's eyes heavy and she drifted off to sleep.

That was yesterday. Now she was awake and sitting in the giant bed contemplating to run out of the dollhouse and away from the giant girl.... but where would she even go? Perhaps Ellie was her safest bet at survival. Even if she was an unpredictable child, she seemed to be sweet and only concerned with her well being.
11.title: Polly's Tale

111.content:
Her reaction to simply run away was nothing more than a inner instinct reaction. Honestly there was few places she could go to. She happened upon a young girl who, so far at least, seemed kind and honest with her. Even if there was a chance she just wanted her as a toy, wasn't it better than alone in the wilderness the size of a person's finger? Where any number of creatures, animal or human, who'd only do her harm. It was no small miracle that she survived as long as she had before she bumped into Ellie. Polly could feel the vibrations throughout the dollhouse of the girl's footfalls, like a small earthquake. Lost in her thoughts she failed to notice the soft snoring had stopped and Ellie had woke. The light from the bedroom window darkened as it was replaces by Ellie's giant mocha colored eye. It receded and the room shook as the giant girl pulled away the wall to the entire front face of the house.

"Morning, Polly!", Ellie said excitedly. She rested her hands on the edge of the second floor as she leaned her face into the room smiling.

"Good morning, Ellie.", Polly replied as she pulled the blanket closer to herself defensively. "Uh... thank you for letting me stay here."

Polly giggled. "Sure! Did you sleep ok?"

"Yeah, actually....," Polly chuckled. "It was the best sleep I've had since...." She trailed off as she thought of how long she'd been alone and like this.

Ellie could sense the change in mood and switched the subject. "Hey, I know. Would you like to take a bath?" Polly looked at her confused at first, then she looked down herself. "I bet a nice bath would make you feel better. You're kinda dirty." Polly looked at her dirty self hoping she didn't get the nice clean bed filthy. "....and smelly.", Ellie added. Polly gasped and stared up at Ellie. They looked at each other for a brief moment before they both started laughing. It felt so good to hear herself laugh again that Polly felt herself loosen her grip on the bed sheets.

Ellie's giant hand slowly entered the room palm up and stopped beside the bed. Polly never got used to the child's enormous hand but, every time, she appreciated that Ellie waited for her to decide on her own to climb onto it. She could have easily forced her will on the diminutive woman by simply grabbing her like one of her toys. But she always allowed for Polly to do it herself. The small woman kicked off the blanket and crawled over to the edge of the expansive bed and climbed onto the soft palm. Once she was settled, Ellie moved her hand out of the room and cupped her other hand beside it for extra safety. As Polly was being swept across the room in the child's hand she sat and thanked her lucky stars that she had come across such a kind girl. She really had no reason to run away from Ellie. Here she was safe. If she was ever to find a way back to normal, she knew she'd do it with Ellie's help.

Seeing a little girl's room the size of a city block rush by you from her palm many stories up is something that can't be explained. Polly stayed in the safety of Ellie's palm watching walls and furniture the size of high rise buildings blur by in a cascade of pinks and whites. She looked up and saw only part of the girl's face from her vantage point. But she could see she was smiling as she carried her little secret friend. Polly realized she too was smiling. Her defenses were beginning to melt away around this mountain of a child. She heard a doorknob click open and she saw a new room that was attached to Ellie's. There was tile on some of the walls and flowery pink wallpaper that looked like some surreal horizon. Ellie brought her hand down to the bathroom counter and stopped as she waited for her tiny passenger to disembark. Polly scooted across the hand and climbed down onto the counter top. The counter was chilly on her bare feet making her shiver a bit. She watched as huge hands and arms went into motion getting her bath ready for her. A hand turned a great faucet handle and water rushed out like a dam releasing out into a basin below. Ellie tested the temp with her hand before finding the right setting and she pulled the sink stopper handle and Polly watched as a huge sink bowl began to fill. Ellie grabbed some of her bubble bath from the tub and poured a little into the water and it began to suds up into a pink foam. Ellie stopped the water, looked down at Polly, and then pulled the stopper a bit before shutting it again after judging it was too deep for her. Satisfied she looked back at Polly and frowned.

"Um... I can leave you by yourself. If you think you'll be Ok." Worry was evident on the girl's face as Polly contemplated her situation. The tiny woman walked to the edge of the basin and looked down the steep slope. "I can help you get in if you want first though...", Ellie said sensing her reservations. "I won't peek. I promise...."
111.title: Morning for Polly.

1111.content:
Polly considered trying to enter the sink herself, but the height and slope made her uneasy. She looked up at Ellie, "I'd like some help, please...". The giant girl smiled and nodded as she turned her head. Polly hesitated before lifting the doll shirt over her head, exposing herself. She draped her arm over her ample breasts and cupped a hand over her crotch as she stood fully vulnerable to anything this colossal girl could do to her. But true to her word, Ellie stood with her face turned awaiting Polly's command. The tiny woman nervously cleared her throat, "Ok, Ellie... I'm ready." The young giantess turned to face her and saw her standing awkwardly covering herself. She lowered her huge palm and Polly did the best she could not to reveal anything as she clamored up onto her hand. As she sat huddled in the girl's hand she noticed Ellie hesitated for a slight moment as she was taking in the tiny woman's figure and her situation. But before long her cheeks went rosy and, embarrassed, she lowered her hand into the sink. Polly and the hand entered the water and the warmth made the tiny woman let out an involuntary sigh. Ellie tilted her hand and Polly slid off fully into the bath water as she submerged before surfacing wiping away the large bubbly suds.

"Is it ok...?", Ellie asked as she hovered over the sink bowl.

Polly sat and the warmth of the water completely drained her of all care in the world. She looked up at her giant caretaker, "It's perfect....", she purred.

Smiling at her friend's satisfaction she suddenly jumped up. "Oops! I almost forgot!" She went to the tub and dabbed a bit of her shampoo on her fingertip. She returned and rubbed it gently into Polly's little scalp, to remove it from her finger and retreated her hand. The tiny woman would be lying if she said she didn't want the finger to continue pampering her with the all too brief scalp massage before it left. "Ok, Polly... I'll leave you alone now. I'm gonna go get dressed. I'll be back to check on ya in a while, 'K?" Polly simply mumbled something back as the bath was feeling so good she was getting lost in it. Ellie saw her sitting in the suds with her hair sticking out in every direction from the shampoo and shook her head smiling and left the room.

Polly was in the strange silence of the sink bowl, alone again. At first her heart quickened it's pace, just as it had when she woke.... but this time for a different reason. Before she was nervous of being tiny and captive by a giant girl. Now, she was nervous because that giant girl wasn't around for her to feel safe. Such a change in just a short time. Was she always this anxious? She had no idea as the memories of herself and her life have yet to return to her. She waded a bit before going about cleaning herself off in the warm soapy water. Everywhere she looked it was mounds of luxurious foam bubbles. She could only imagine what something like this might cost in the real world, where here it was a drop of a giant girl's bubble bath. Cleaning away the grime she saw faint bruises on her legs and arms, reminding her of the trials she went through in the past weeks. She pushed the thoughts aside with a grimace. She was here now.... floating in a sea of bubbles and she wasn't going to let herself ruin it.

After she finished washing herself and hair she leaned back in the water and just floated among the bubbles... staring at the far away ceiling of Ellie's bathroom. Occasionally she could hear the thudding of the girl's feet in the next room and knowing of her close proximity made her feel more at ease. She daydreamed of her giant protector as she floated in the sink. Ellie's big brown expressive eyes, the long slightly unkempt waves of chestnut hair and the way an unruly lock of it would fall over her face causing her to pull it behind her ear, her cute grin that was missing a baby tooth, her golden skin from days of playing in the sun, her soft gentle and protective hands. If she had to be stuck like this with no memories, she could do worse than being the guest of this lovely child. 'Guest'... she was possibly being a tad generous with her position in this arrangement. Ellie most likely thought of her as some wondrous little pet. Or at worst, her new toy. But the giant girl showed no signs of being any more than a concerned friend to her. Polly sat up in the water pondering Ellie's true intentions. Considering she might be just this girl's pet... actually didn't seem so bad to her. If in exchange for being kept in a dollhouse and played with like a living breathing doll to a gigantic young girl meant being pampered and cared for in her current state.... Polly thought she came out on top of this deal. If somehow Ellie became too demanding or... hurt her... she could maybe simply run away, couldn't she? Back to the outside... back to the dangers of everything trying to kill her... back to being alone. It was the 'being alone' part that actually made her shiver and seemed to make the bath water chill around her. Polly shook her head and pushed the possibility of Ellie suddenly becoming some giant monster away from her mind. Ellie was a sweet girl.

Polly stood in the waist deep water chuckling at her own paranoia and looked up at the side of the sink bowl. She was done and wanted out now, but the sides of the basin were far too high and far too steep for her to climb out herself. "Ellie?", she called out. No answer. She must be too far to hear her small voice. "Ellie! I'm ready to come out now!", she called again but louder. Still no answer. She stood listening for sounds from the next room but heard nothing. "Ellie?!", she yelled. Again, silence. Polly went to the basin's wall and tried to climb, but the mixture of the slope and the bubbly water caused her to simply slide back down with every attempt. "ELLIE?!", she screamed out. Panic was returning to her. Where had she gone? What if someone else came into Ellie's bathroom and found her? Someone less friendly than her giant girl. She scrambled against the side of the sink frantically trying to get out, screaming Ellie's name. Eventually she gave up and stood with her arms wrapped around herself. Partly due to the sudden drop in water temperature and also from her panic attack. "ELLIE?!?!", she cried. The walls of the sink seemed to rise up even further around her. The happy solitude of her bath was now deafeningly silent, except for her hurried breathing. She stood, praying for the sound of Ellie's footsteps for what seemed like an eternity. The water was now ice cold and she was in a knot of arms and legs trying to contain her body warmth. "....Ellie?", she was repeating, but now in a hushed whimper.

Then she heard it... footsteps in the next room! "Ellie?!", she said in hopes it was her giant. But what if it wasn't? What if it was someone else? She could hear the doorknob to the bathroom turn and open as she stood in the cold sink, waiting to see who was going to be looming over her...
1111.title: Polly' Bath

11111.content:
Polly could hear the footsteps but could see nothing beyond the rim of the sink. Then she heard a voice, and that voice made her weep tears uncontrollably. But not tears of fear, but joy...

"Polly, I'm back." Ellie's voice rang out slightly echoed from the bathroom walls. Polly still couldn't see her. "Mom asked me what I've been doing in my room, but I told her I was just playing." The room filled with giggles. "Anyway, I brought you..." Ellie finally breached the rim of the basin and was looking in. Her sentence was cut short and her cute tooth missing smile was began to fade as she looked down at the tiny shivering woman standing amid water with only traces of bubbles left. The minuscule woman was visibly shivering from cold and Ellie could hear sobbing. "P-... Polly... wha...," she stammered, not knowing what had happened in her absence. Polly just looked up at her with tears streaming down her face and raised her arms up, like a small child wanting to be lifted up. Ellie lowered her hand quickly to the water and surrounded her small friend's body in a fist. Modesty had left entirely as the giant girl held her in her fist as it raised out of the chilly water. Ellie, having felt the temperature of the bath water, immediately realized what had happened. She'd been away too long. Polly, wrapped in Ellie's giant hand, was quickly warmed... making her cling to Ellie's finger and thumb with all her might. Ellie quickly set Polly down amid a hand towel and wrapped her gently up in it. Seeing the tiny woman cling to the wrap shivering and sobbing made her look away in full guilt. It was Polly who broke the silence.

"W-where w-were you?!" It was the first time she raised her voice at the mountainous child. She didn't care about any size difference or consequence. Ellie fidgeted with the napkin she brought up from breakfast that had small bits of her meal that she made special for her new friend. But none of that mattered now as Ellie refused to look at Polly as she played with the food and her face began to twist in shame. "I a-almost froze to death!" Polly continued. "W-what if s-someone else came in and f-found me?!"

"I'm sorry, Polly...," Ellie whimpered, as if she were being scolded by a full sized adult. "I... I didn't know I was gone so long." Tears were now flowing from both woman and child. As warmth began to return to her tiny body, Polly started to simmer down as she sat wrapped in a pink hand towel. She was about to continue to reprimand the giant when Ellie cut her off.

"I didn't mean to leave you! Mommy says I never take good care of things! I used to have a hamster, but mommy took it away because I'd forget to feed it... or clean it's cage. I still have the cage... I even thought of putting you in it before we used the dollhouse....," Ellie wiped her eyes and her nose before finally looking at Polly on the counter. "But mommy always says I can't have pets any more! Maybe I shouldn't have you, either..." Ellie's hand descended on Polly and snatched her from the towel. Before she knew what was happening she was sitting in Ellie's open palm right in front of her face. She didn't even bother covering herself up, as it was all a blur of motion before she was looking into Ellie's big brown tear streaked eyes.

"You're not safe with me, I guess...," Ellie whimpered, as Polly was beginning to worry where this was heading. "I should just bring you back where I found you...," And there it was. Polly panicked and tried to get a word in, but Ellie wasn't hearing anything in her self-scolding. "I don't want you to get hurt again, Polly... It's better this way." Ellie closed her fingers around the tiny naked woman and started to walk out of her room.

Polly tried to wriggle free of the prison of fingers but they were not budging. She started to pound her tiny fists on the hand around her and screaming for her to open her hand. But Ellie continued to walk out her room and then her house. Before long she was at the edge of the lot behind her house where she first laid eyes on her tiny friend. She opened her hand and Polly scrambled and stood up gripping one of Ellie's fingers for stability as she felt the hand slowly descend to the ground.

"Ellie! Ellie no!!" Polly could see the ground below and recognized the tall tree sized grass as it stretched out like a vast forest. "Ellie, please no!!" Looking up she could see Ellie's face was the picture of regret and sadness as she lowered her little friend down. The hand stopped and Polly saw the ground around her and panicked. "Ellie, please!!" The hand slowly tilted intending to drop her off, but Polly gripped her giant index finger as her feet slid out from under her. "Ellie, I forgive you!! Please!!"

"Polly...," Ellie said amid sobs, "This is for the best." Ellie shook her hand and Polly lost her grip and tumbled down the hand and landed with a thump on the dirt ground. Ellie sat there stooped down towering over Polly as she watched her scramble to her feet. "Go on...," Ellie's hand moved down and gently pushed the doll woman towards the tall grass.

"No!!," Polly screamed. "Ellie , No!!" The giant girl stood back up, her face from Polly's vantage blocked out by the sun behind her. But she knew the giant girl was still crying as she slowly turned around and began to walk back home alone. Polly ran after her, but each stride of the giant girl was too much for her to match. She screamed up to her in total desperation as she imagined her life back in the wild alone. "Ellie, please take me with you!! Ellie, please!! Ellie... I'll die without you!!"

That made the giant girl stop. Ellie turned around and watched as the tiny adult ran through the grass towards her. Her words struck her hard. She didn't want to accidentally neglect her new friend... but she also didn't want her to be in danger alone out here. Polly finally reached the giant girl's feet in giant pairs of flip flops. She dropped to her knees and wrapped her arms around Ellie's second toe. She squeezed the enormous digit as she wept, pleading with the girl. "Please, Ellie... I won't make it... please, please..." Among her frantic pleading, Polly realized what she was doing... bear hugging a young girl's toe. For a moment it entered her mind just how impossibly huge this child was. She glanced over briefly at the big toe and saw the shoddy nail polish job, obviously done by a youngster. A shade somewhere between red and pink... and for a split second she imagined Ellie giving her the chore of painting them and the image broke her sobbing as she reveled in it.

Shadows shifted around her as she looked up and saw a giant hand reaching for her. It wrapped around her, gently as always, and lifted her up. In that span of a second she went from sobbing to elation that the youngster was possibly taking her back. Ellie opened her hand and Polly sat in the middle staring back with a weak smile. Ellie stared back at her, "You really want me to take you back?"

"More than anything!" Polly shouted back. A huge finger came from behind and stroked the tiny woman's hair. Polly realized she was being petted like a small animal, but she didn't care if she got her giant back. A smile broke out on Ellie's face as she stroked her hair. Eventually she realized her little friend was nude, and her eyes glanced at places she knew she shouldn't and then away again before she was caught. Only thing is Polly noticed, but pretended she didn't. She didn't care... she was safe again. Ellie turned and walked with her tiny woman in her hand as she continued to pet her, admiring her little body. Not even bothering to dart her eyes away anymore. Polly rode in her hand and she nuzzled the giant fingertip with her cheek as she sat and let the giant girl examine her with her eyes as they both went back to the house.
11111.title: Reserved for my story.

111111.content:
Ellie walked through her house, avoiding any family, and trotted up to her room. She had her hands cupped over one another To protect her little friend and also to hide her from eyes. Entering her bedroom she closed the door behind her and knelt beside her dollhouse. Pulling aside one half of the front wall she deposited Polly onto the bed. Seeing the mini three inch adult woman sitting on the bed made for twelve inch Barbies always brought a smile to her face.

"I'm so glad you let me bring you home, Polly." A giant hand entered the room and rummaged through the plastic piece of furniture that was to be Barbie's wardrobe closet. When it left the closet it was holding little Barbie clothes in it's fingers. "Let's play dress up," Ellie said excitedly. "We can find something that fits you."

The hand hovered over the little woman and dumped a few pieces of doll clothes on the bed next to Polly. The little woman examined the clothes and before even putting anything on she knew the dress was going to be way too big for her. But something told her Ellie did it on purpose just to see her in it for a joke. Polly stood up and lifted the one piece short skirted dress over her head and down her little body. It was comical. The dress hung awkwardly on one of her shoulders while the other side drooped down her side. The hem of the skirt was far too long and it piled up around her feet. Polly stood smiling up at Ellie as she shrugged her shoulders making sure to look as pathetic as possible. Her giant audience laughed and rolled back on her seat at the sight of her. When she was done her hand entered the room again and gently lifted it off Polly.

"Nope... too big for you." The small woman stood nude again as another piece of doll clothes was handed to her. It was a shirt made for Barbie and again it was too large. The length would have been fine but the width was more than Polly could fill and it too drooped down her side."Geez... even a shirt's too big for you."

She walked quickly across the room and stood next to the huge footwear. One shoe had landed right side up, but one was on its side. Polly walked to its opening and stood looking into its darkness. Immediately from feet away she could already smell the inside of the shoe. It had the smell of a days workout of sweat and body odor. She could see the slightly discolored indent in the sole where Jenna's heel pressed in. Sticking her head in she looked down the long length of the shoe down to the toe area. Polly raised her foot up and stepped onto the padded inside of the sneaker and entered. Jenna's scent was everywhere and to Polly it was glorious. Walking to the wall of the sole of the shoe she placed her hand on the dirty indentation and could feel a slight dampness. Removing her hand she rubbed her fingers together and smelled them. She had no idea if in her past life she was so oddly attracted to feet, let alone girl's feet.... but she absolutely was now. She closed her eyes and breathed in so deeply it almost hurt her lungs. When she opened them all she could think was she wished she was living in here... not the shoebox. Fearing getting caught she exited the shoe and already she missed it. Nearby were the discarded socks Jenna wore.

Jenna finished her shower and after drying herself and putting on comfortable lounge shorts and a shirt she exited her bathroom. She walked over to her bed and collapsed onto it letting out an exhausted sigh. From the floor next to her shoebox, Polly watched as the teen giantess thundered by and shook her world when she slumped onto her bed. All she could see was Jenna from the knees down as her legs hung over the side of the bed. She walked over to Jenna's foot and tapped her hand on it. The foot jerked up, probably surprised, and Jenna sat up and leaned over looking down at her. Polly waved meekly. The teen reached her hand down to the floor and Polly quickly climbed on. Jenna raised her up and then leaned back on her bed with Polly cupped in her hand. She smiled as she lowered her hand to her chest and tilted it just enough for Polly to understand and climb off. The three inch woman stood on Jenna's shirt in what she imagined was right between the teen's breasts. She sat down and enjoyed the slow methodical rise and lower of the young giantess' breathing. It reminded her of Ellie.

"I'm really sorry for earlier." Jenna apologized again. "I mean.... I really didn't know she ever came in my room. And now, it's like she thinks I'm this... typical teenager who freaks out if anyone comes in here."

"Its fine, Jenna." Polly assured. "Although.... it was kind of scary." Jenna looked down at her concerned. "Ok... it was a lot scary." Polly laughed.

"We'll have to think of something. I mean I can't, like... take you with me. Where would I hide you?" Jenna asked but got only a shrug from Polly. "And I don't really wanna lock you up here. Like some sort of pet or something."

"I guess for when you're gone we could slide my house under your bed." Jenna thought about it. "Well.... by 'we' I mean you."

"That sounds like a good idea, I guess. Too bad Ellie's such a brat or I'd have her watch you." Jenna absent-mindedly raised a finger up and stroked Polly's hair. It was a few seconds before she even realized what she was doing. "Oh geez... I'm sorry. I wasn't thinking." Jenna's finger was retreating when Polly's tiny hand held it indicating to stop.

"No... it's ok. It's nice." Polly said as she pulled the finger back and by her head. Jenna smiled and continued to run her fingertip down the long hair of her tiny friend.
11111111111111111111111.title: Not Home Alone

111111111111111111111111.content:
Polly had her eyes closed as she let Jenna continue to stroke her hair. Each time the girl's giant fingertip met her head she swayed slightly in euphoria. Her enjoyment wasn't so well hidden that Jenna didn't notice.

"You really like this...", Jenna said. Polly snapped out of her trance so hard she actually gave a slight snort sound. She leaned away from the teen's finger embarrassed.

"Heh... I guess I just missed human interaction.... sorry."

"No... it's ok. I like it, too. I.... just didn't want you to, like... think I was petting you. Like a pet, ya know..."

"I know you don't think of me like that, Jenna." Polly assured. "But", she continued, "I could easily see how you accidentally could. I mean I'm only three inches tall and live in your shoebox." Jenna laughed and Polly was shook as she steadied herself on her chest.

"Maybe I could do tricks next time you bring me some goldfish crackers." Polly joked as she got up and danced and jumped around in the shirt covered valley of Jenna's young cleavage. In her goofing around she found herself on top of Jenna's left breast. As the teen laughed at her antics Polly could feel the firm yet yielding breast beneath her feet jostle. Tired, Polly fell back on her rump and onto Jenna's breast. She was slightly higher up than she was in the valley down below and she was able to see Jenna's face better. God she was pretty. Very little makeup, none was needed but she used a bit anyway. Those big pale green eyes, tearing up a bit in her laughter. When the teen settled down they sat, Jenna laying back on her bed and Polly on her breast, and admired each other quietly.

To Jenna it was just bananas that on her left boob was a tiny adult. One who relied on her for safety and her life, really. It was more responsibility than the young girl had ever had before, that was without a doubt. She enjoyed watching her do... well anything. She was so cute at her small size. Plus she was attractive. Her tissue clothes only emphasized that. But she didn't want to come off like she was treating her like a small pet. But it seemed like Polly enjoyed it just as much.

"So...", Polly said trying to avoid being too obvious in her staring. "How was your workout?"

Jenna let out an exasperated sigh. "Rough... I just wasn't feeling it today for some reason. I don't know..." But then she got serious, in her face and the sound of her voice. "But I miss it. A lot." Polly knew she was thinking whatever it was that she skirted around earlier. She didn't press any further, deciding to change the subject.

"You think I could do it?" Polly asked.

The question snapped Jenna out of her thoughts, a little confused. "Do what?"

"Your exercises."

"I don't know...", Jenna laughed. "It's mostly just tumbling and gymnastics."

"What... like cartwheels?"

"Something like that, I guess." Jenna giggled.

Polly stood up on Jenna's breast and steadied herself. She raised her hands in preparation to do a cartwheel, but as she backed up intending to do one in the direction of Jenna's face, her foot stepped on something.... a bump in the shirt fabric that made her lose her footing. She started to fall backwards and she tumbled down Jenna's breast and on to her abdomen. Jenna gasped, worried about her little friend, but once she saw she was ok she started to laugh.

Jenna's whole body shook and Polly rumbled around, herself laughing. But her mind was preoccupied with what betrayed her up on her perch. Given where it was... she surmised it was Jenna's nipple. She tripped over the thirteen year old's protruding nipple. That image was hard to move from her mind.

"Well.... guess that answered my question if I could." Polly joked.

Jenna, after settling down, cupped her hand around Polly for consoling. "Aww.... you looked adorable trying, though. So I give it a 10."

Polly giggled. She looked up in front of her and she sat in the shadow of the teen's breasts. At normal height they wouldn't be THAT impressive. Ample for and thirteen year old but not crazy like they are to a person smaller than her finger. She gulped hard pushing back images that refused to not flood her mind. Instead she focused elsewhere... she eyed the hand she was leaning against. Polly placed her hand on Jenna's index fingertip. Her hand fit on it with room to spare. She rubbed her hand around it feeling the minute ridges of the fingerprint.

"I can't even imagine what being your size must be like." Jenna said.

"Its pretty wild...." Polly replied as she moved her hand to the hard shiny surface of Jenna's fingernail. At her size she could see small imperfections in the pale gun metal blue polish coating.

"I'd be SO scared.... like, all the time." Jenna said exasperated.

"It's not all bad...", Polly confessed. "When I have a big protector fawning over me." She reached up and wrapped her arms around Jenna's thumb.

Jenna smiled. "Oh geez....", she said as she rolled her eyes.

A knock at her door startled both of them. Jenna's hand instinctively wrapped around Polly and hid her behind Jenna as she sat up. "What is it?" Her mother's voice from the other side answered.

"Diner's ready."

"Ok..." Jenna held Polly up in front of her as they both sighed in relief. "I gotta go." She said as she lowered her friend to the floor next to her shoebox home. "I'll bring you back something, k?" She stood up and plodded out of her room shutting her door.

Polly walked into her home to wait eagerly for her giant friend to return. She stopped at her ankle sock bed and fell backward onto it. Closing her eyes she inhaled deeply. She wasn't sure if Jenna would notice the sock was slightly dirty or not. Polly had swapped out her clean bed for Jenna's discarded workout sock while she showered. Polly ran her hands along it. Jenna's scent was all around her now. She almost had no reason to leave bed.... almost.
111111111111111111111111.title: Cheer Tryouts

1111111111111111111111111.content:
It wasn't long before Polly heard Jenna's thundering footsteps and the door open. The teen walked to her desk and placed her smuggled food there and bent down and carefully lifted the shoebox and placed it there, also. Polly gripped the sock and the wall behind her as her home was lifted high into the air and rested with a thump on the desk. Knowing she was safe in the teen's hands she allowed herself to enjoy the thrill of the ride as brief as it was. Jenna's smiling face appeared over the roofless box.

"Hey, Polly." She greeted. "I grabbed you some dinner." Polly walked out and saw a napkin with food on it. "We had cheeseburgers and fries."

Jenna pushed the napkin towards the tiny woman implying she had something to show. Polly looked at it and her mouth dropped. Jenna had taken the time to slice up a fry into Polly sized mini fries. Next to that was a tiny chunk of beef patty with a tiny bit of cheese and two tiny bits of bun that had the tiniest dabs of ketchup and mustard. Polly was amazed.

"Jenna.... you didn't have to do all this. I could have just eaten it however."

"But I wanted to." Jenna beamed. "Besides it was fun. Mom thought I was playing with my food. Ellie gave me looks but kept quiet."

Polly sat on the napkin and started to eat. It was the closest she'd had to a real meal in forever. Meaning a meal that was proportioned to her.

"I better apologize now..." Jenna said. Polly almost dropped her cheeseburger thinking all this too good to be true was exactly that. "I might start giggling. I don't mean to... but this is, like the cutest thing I've EVER seen."

Polly laughed as she resumed eating as the giant teen sat hovering over her. Jenna lowered Polly's doll mug, that she dug out of the dislodged contents of the shoebox, filled with Coke. As the tiny woman ate and drank, Jenna went about fixing the shoebox again.

Polly leaned back completely full and watched giant hands move around lifting her 'furniture' about. Jenna was going to fold the sock back up when she noticed something. It was soiled a bit. Lifting it up she examined it and she could smell it was the one she wore earlier today. Polly saw the sock lift up and her veins ran cold.

Jenna held the sock out, "Polly... is this my dirty sock? Did you switch the clean one?" Polly slowly pushed herself back away from the accusing teen giant. "Why would you do that?"

Polly sat almost shivering in guilt. "Jenna... I..."

"You did, didn't you?" Jenna asked shocked.

"Jenna, I'm sorry.... I..", Polly said avoiding eye contact. "I don't know why I do these things! Please, Jenna... I'm sorry!" Polly took handfuls of her hair as she hunched over shaking.

"You'd rather sleep on an old smelly sock than a clean one....?" Jenna asked.

"Honest, Jenna.... I don't know why I'm like this!" Polly could sense Jenna's hand coming down to grab her and toss her away. But she saw it's shadow glide past her and back into the shoebox. Polly saw Jenna was folding it back up and lining it up as Polly's bed again. She got up and entered the shoebox confused and still weeping.

"Wha.... what's happening?" Polly asked as she looked up and into the eyes of Jenna who was busy folding the sock.

"If it's what you want, I guess it's ok." Jenna could see the frightened confused look on her tiny face. "It's not like it's hurting anything."

"Y-you don't care?!" Polly asked bewildered. "You not weirded out by it?"

"Well, yeah... it's weird. But... like I said. It's not hurting anything. You've been through enough already... what's the harm in letting you have this?" Polly smiled so hard in hurt. She ran to Jenna's hand and wrapped her arms around one finger. "Ok, ok... you little weirdo." Jenna said laughing.

Polly let go and fell back on her rump. "I... I just don't believe you're not going to punish me." She said still trying to process it.

"I'd never punish you... that's not even a thing... but I can if you want me to." Jenna joked. "I mean... I get it. You have that thing where people like feet, right?"

Polly was about to answer but fell short when she considered she didn't know what it meant. "I wish I knew, Jenna. I really do. I just don't know what I was like before", she waved her hands down her tiny frame, "this happened."

"And this is why Ellie was weirded out." Polly sat uncomfortably knowing it went beyond that. "She's too young to understand. Like I said, it's just an old sock. If it'll give you a little bit of happiness what do I care." She leaned into the shoebox and sniffed. Her nose wrinkled. "I can't believe you like that, though. You really do?"

"Yeah... I don't know why but I do. I think you smell incredible...," Polly got embarrassed blurting that out. "I mean.... I don't know what I mean."

"Don't sweat it." Jenna said with and wave of her hand. "What do you say about going to the mall tomorrow and seeing if we can find Polly sized stuff for you?"

"How am I going to go with you? Your pocket?" The confined space of a jeans pocket didn't sound very appealing.

"I have an idea.... don't you worry." Jenna replied grinning.
1111111111111111111111111.title: Confessions Over Dinner

11111111111111111111111111.content:
Jenna changed into her clothes for sleeping and skipped over to the shoebox on the floor and squatted over it. Polly on the inside felt the box rumble and then her sky filled with a giant grinning teenager.

"You wanna come sleep on my bed tonight?" Jenna asked. Her flowing enthusiasm was overwhelmingly obvious.

Polly appreciated that she asked first instead of grabbing her like a bedtime dolly. "Sure, if you're OK with it." She said.

"Course I am. Why wouldn't I be?"

"No reason...", but Polly knew her revelation of her obsession with Jenna's sock might have made something like this seem awkward. But apparently Jenna really didn't care. The teen lowered her hand down and held it palm up next to Polly. The little woman had secretly wished she'd get used to handling her. Aside from her just being lazy and not wanting to have to climb up onto a hand, she still got a thrill of this gigantic teen just wrapping her strong hand around her. Still she clamored up and sat in the middle of Jenna's hand as she felt herself lifted up like an elevator. Jenna cupped a hand behind her palm occupant and skipped over to her bed. She turned around and plopped backwards onto it as she protected Polly from falling, but did it to give her a little bit of a fright.

Polly let out a slight yelp and Jenna laughed. "Sorry, Polly... I couldn't resist." Jenna lay on her back as her hand holding Polly rested on her stomach. Polly got off and walked up to the teen's rising cleavage. She scrambled up and sat on the shirt covered left breast. Jenna was smiling the entire time she watched the three inch woman climb up her body. She didn't want to admit it, but she enjoyed seeing Polly manage her way around mundane situations. She thought it was adorable, but didn't want her to think she disrespected her because she was so tiny. She was first and foremost her friend. She just happened to be three inches of cute. "Comfy?" She asked jokingly. It still made Polly turn a shade of pink.

The two chatted about various things. Jenna's school, which was about to end for summer vacation. Jenna's exercises and her friends outside in the real world. Although Jenna assured her she was just as much her friend as they were, and it filled Polly with a rush of happiness to be included. The tiny woman considered asking about why she was no longer on the cheer team, but she didn't want to ruin Jenna's good mood. Occasionally during their conversation, Jenna would stroke Polly's hair with her finger making the tiny sigh in contentment.

Jenna yawned wide. "Think I'm ready for sleep." Polly yawned contagiously and nodded her head. "I, uh.... sleep on my side, so...." Polly took a second before she realized what she was implying. She got up and walked across her sternum and shimmied down her shoulder onto Jenna's pillow. The giant teen situated herself on her side, and the movement threw Polly off balance and she stumbled onto her butt into the pillow. As she lay there Jenna reached to her nightstand and brought a sock she set aside for Polly to use as a blanket.

"Thanks... how ever did you know?" Polly laughed.

"Well, sorry to disappoint but it's clean. I don't want to smell my feet all night." They both laughed.

Jenna was soon out and lightly snoring. Polly stayed awake and just watched her sleep. Some of Jenna's hair spread out to beside Polly and she ran her hands through it. It was so soft. She brought it up to her face and smelled it. It was some fruit scented shampoo mixed with Jenna's bodily smell. A scent probably unacceptable to someone normal sized. But Polly could smell it. Maybe one small benefit to being as big as a girl's pinkie. Or at least a benefit if the person was a cute clean teen girl. She rested back down and just smiled as she drifted off to sleep watching the beautiful teen girl.

Night Passed:

Polly was awoke by a nudging to her shoulder. Opening her eyes she saw Jenna stooped over her fully dressed and smiling. "Morning, sleepy." Jenna kidded. Polly sat up and rubbed sleep from her eyes. She smelled food and saw another napkin.

"How on earth did I sleep through you getting up off the bed?!" She asked yawning.

"Yeah, you were totally out. I decided to let you sleep while I went down for breakfast." Jenna sat carefully on the bedside and watched as Polly got up and sat down on the napkin.

Polly saw a tiny plate about her size, but maybe a platter size. It must have been for bigger dolls. On it were small roughly cut round pieces of pancakes with syrup dabbed on them. Next to that were small chunks of bacon and her mug with orange juice. Polly smiled and shook her head. "Jenna... you pamper me too much. This is incredible."

Jenna beamed a wide grin, actually a bit proud of herself. "I like to pamper you." Polly sat and ate the pancakes without any utensils so syrup got all over her fingers.

"Surprise.... I thought of that, too." Jenna lowered lowered damp napkin and set it beside her tiny friend. Polly shook her head chuckling as she wiped her hands off.

As Polly finished and sat with her mug of juice Jenna discarded the trash and saved the little dish. "Did you like it?" She asked.

"It was amazing, thank you Jenna. Although..."

Jenna's face went serious. "What...?"

"I'd give anything to have have a cup of black coffee next time. If its ok."

Jenna smiled again, relieved. "Sure. No problem. So... you ready to go shopping?"

Polly still had no idea how this was going to work, but nodded. "What was your idea on this?"

Jenna grinned and brushed aside her long hair behind her shoulders and with her finger tapped a pocket on the breast of her shirt. She lowered her hand and Polly quickly scrambled on, eager to try this out. Jenna propped open the pocket with her free hand and tilted her other and Polly slid in. Releasing the pocket Polly sat atop Jenna's breast and her head poked out and her little hands gripped the pocket hem.

"Isn't it genius?!" Jenna asked proud of herself again. Polly looked out from her pocket and relished that she was up against the teen's soft breast and a perfect bird's eye view.

"This is amazing! You're so smart..." The comment made Jenna giddy and her hair fell over Polly and the pocket. Polly tried to clear it away but there was too much of it. Jenna brushed it aside. "Whoops. Sorry... well I can use my hair to, like... hide you quick if need be." She laughed.

When Polly looked up she saw just Jenna's chin and nose unless she looked down to face her. Looking down she saw her flat tummy that lead down to long strong legs. When Jenna started walking she could see her huge feet stepping in unison and she imagined what it must be like way down there under the powerful crushing power of her steps. From her skyscraper vantage point it was like she was controlling her own giant movie monster. A beautiful teenage Godzilla girl.

Walking to her bedroom door Jenna paused and looked down at her cute shirt passenger. "Ready?"

"Yup!" Jenna opened her door and the two left the house together.
11111111111111111111111111.title: Polly's Pocket

111111111111111111111111111.content:
Walking along the sidewalk was a complete thrill for Polly. Each step made Jenna's breast jiggle behind her. Again, it would have been undetected by anyone not three inches tall and sitting on top of it. She loved looking down and watching her feet as they thundered along the sidewalk far, far below....

"How is it? You feel safe in there?" Jenna asked.

How could Polly tell her how amazing it was to ride on her breast? "It's wonderful. It's like I'm riding a moving skyscraper."

"Nice...." Jenna laughed. They'd been chatting here and there along the way. Polly enjoyed being outside again. This time in the protective custody of Jenna, allowing her to relax and breathe in the fresh air and sunshine. She wasn't stranded out here fending for her life. She had a giant teenage ptotector. It wasn't until they came to a crosswalk and there were other people. One man turned to look at the teen who appeared to be talking to herself. Jenna lowered her head a bit embarrassed. The light changed and she stayed back while everyone else walked across.

"That was awkward..." She said. Polly was hiding in her pocket giggling. "Oh, you think it's funny huh?" Jenna said as she poked her pocket making Polly squeal in surprise. "I think I have an idea..." She reached into her back pocket and took out her cell phone. She held it up to her face and pretended to talk into it as she talked to Polly. "Pretty slick, dontcha think?"

"Pretty slick." Polly laughed.

When they got to the mall, Polly was in awe. She's never getting used to being three inches, but every so often something pounds the point in. And the sheer magnitude of the mall, with its wide open areas and multitude of giants moving around, just dumb-founded her. She lowered herself into Jenna's pocket and peeked out over the hem.

"There's this one store.. I forget where it is exactly... but it has a whole section of, like... special dolls. They might have something for you." Jenna said as she made her way through the crowds.

After about ten minutes of walking and backtracking they cane to the specialty toy shop. Jenna saw a store employee was walking up to her and she flicked her hair over her breast pocket covering Polly.

"Can I help you find anything?"

"Uh, yeah..." Jenna replied. "Where's the doll section?" The employee brought her to the back of the store. The section was filled with dollhouses and furniture of various scales.

"Is there, like a small doll section?" Jenna asked.

"How small?"

"Three inches... like a Polly Pocket." The clerk pointed out a section of all kinds of merchandise suited for Polly's scale. "Wow... I thought this was going to be hard to find stuff that's size."

"We've had a big run on that scale recently and we've had to adjust the shelves to accommodate it." The clerk stood over her as she browsed.

"Ok.... thank you." Jenna said implying to be left alone. The clerk forced a smile and left. Jenna poked her pocket. "Ok. It's clear now."

Polly popped her head and shoulders out and let out a blast of breath. It was stuffy down in the pocket against the radiating body heat of Jenna's breast behind her. "Man it gets hot in there." She gasped. "I don't know how Polly Pocket does it." Polly said making Jenna giggle.

The teen began rifling through the doll clothes, holding ones up whenever she saw something that wasn't colonial style. What was it with dollhouse dolls being colonial style? Any of the clothes she held up looked ok, but the material looked stiff and uncomfortable. It was andll made from normal sized people material that left it thick and coarse.

"I don't know if we're gonna find anything in the clothes." Jenna said. "Unless you think any of it would work out."

"If I wore any of that I'd be scratching nonstop."

"I'm sorry, Polly. I thought for sure we'd find something."

"Its ok. The tissue clothes will have to do for a while."

Jenna started looking through the furniture. "At least this looks more promising." She held up a bed in her hand that was just the right size for Polly. To Jenna it was toy furniture, but to Polly it was a luxury sized bed. She doubted in her old life if she had one so extravagant.

"That looks amazing." She said.

"Awesome.... plus I get to tuck you in at night." Jenna kidded.

"I'll trade out the comforter for the sock, though." Jenna rolled her eyes.

They found at couch and a table and chairs. Jenna found something and held it up for Polly to see. It was a stylish toilet. "So... we could, like..." Jenna struggled to say it. Polly laughed nervously, still feeling awkward to have this sweet kid clean out her business.... which for some reason she hadn't had to yet. Jenna placed it in her hand basket and moved on.

They strolled along, looking at the dollhouses. Some were small and compact, some were big enough for Jenna to squat in. The smaller ones were decently priced because no girl wanted a dollhouse with two rooms. But for what Polly needed in was perfect. The clerk came back asking if she was finding everything, making Polly duck back down hiding and forcing Jenna to be slightly rude.

Jenna and Polly walked around the rest of the store, just enjoying being out together. As they talked and browsed a little girl was secretly following them. The girl had thought it was odd this older girl was in a toy store, then even odder still that she seemed to be talking to herself. As she followed her, straying from her mother, she thought she saw movement from the teenager's pocket. When the teen bent over to look at something on the bottom shelf she saw what looked like a tiny person almost fall out. The teen quickly cupped her hand to her pocket and helped her stay. The little girl gasped and rushed the teen girl.

"What was that?!" She asked.

"What?" Jenna asked startled by the sudden appearance of this girl.

"In your pocket! I saw a tiny person in your pocket!"

Jenna laughed nervously as she darted her eyes around. "No.... that's silly." She said. But the girl saw a small bulge in her pocket shifting around.

"There!" The girl said loudly as she pointed to Jenna's shirt pocket.

"Kid.... I don't know what you think you saw, but..." Jenn started but was cut off.

"Show me the little person or I'm getting my mommy."
111111111111111111111111111.title: Polly and the Dollstore

1111111111111111111111111111.content:
Jenna stood unsure what to do. If the girl got her mother, Polly would be exposed. And her little friend had explicitly said she didn't want anyone to know about her. But if she did let her see Polly, she'd still be revealing her to someone. She looked around and all she saw was a woman browsing who may be the girl's mother, and the clerk who was already eyeing them suspicioisly. Ultimately this was Polly's call.

She leaned down to her pocket and whispered, "Polly.... what do I do?"

There was no answer or movement. Just as Jenna was about to stall for time, Polly popped out of the pocket in view of the little girl. The girl's eyes lit up and a huge grin spread across her face.

"Oh my gosh! She's so cuuuute!" The girl gushed.

Polly waved, "Hello..."

Looking up at Jenna the girl asked, "Can I hold her? Pleeease? I'll be extra careful!"

"I don't think that's a good idea." Jenna said hesitantly.

"I'm fine with it, Jenna..." Polly said. Surprising both girls. The little girl carefully placed her hand palm up by Jenna's shirt pocket and Polly climbed up onto it. The girl brought her closer to her face and looked her up and down.

"She's so perfect. You're so lucky to have one." The girl gushed to Jenna who was nervously watching around for prying eyes.

"Hello, little lady. My name is Hannah." The girl said holding the tiny woman like she were made of delicate china.

"Nice to meet you Hannah. My name's Polly." Polly said.

The little girl was absolutely beside herself as she placed a hand over her mouth giggling. That hand soon slowly advanced to Polly who watched as a finger came and play with her hair. "You're sooo pretty." The girl continued to admire her. "I'm so jealous you got one. I want one just like Polly."

Jenna was beginning to think they were pushing their luck with Polly out in the open like this. "Ok, shows over Hannah." She held out her hand and Hannah grumbled something as she tilted her hand allowing for Polly to slide onto the teen's palm.

"Maybe I'll see you here again, Polly. Don't worry...." She leaned in with a hand cupped beside her mouth, " I won't tell no one." She reached up and patted Polly on her head.

"Thank you, Hannah. You're a sweet girl." Polly smiled back.

Hannah's mother called for her and she walked away but not before turning and waving goodbye. Polly and Jenna both waved back.

"Well... that could have gone way worse." Jenna said relieved. "You think she'll keep her word?" She asked as she deposited Polly back in her breast pocket.

"I think so. I trust kids more than I would adults." Polly reasoned.

Jenna approached the counter, paid for the doll items and they walked back home. When she arrived, Jenna was met by Ellie on the staircase.

"What's up, Ellie?" Jenna asked. Polly, hearing Ellie's name, perked up inside Jenna's pocket.

"Where did you go?" Ellie asked, arms crossed.

"The mall." Jenna answered. "Bought some stuff for Polly."

"And you brought her with you?!" Ellie asked shocked. It was then that Polly emerged from from the shirt pocket.

"Yes. She was with me the entire time." Jenna said as she brought a hand up to her pocket defensively. Ellie stood staring at Polly, not saying anything. It wasn't until Jenna walked by her that she broke her silence.
