"Thank you, Ellie!" A slightly disheveled Jack said. Still nude he was now covered in wet dirt where the toddler had stuck his mouth on him and the saliva made the dirt stick. "I swear I'll be a better pet." He said as he brushed himself off. His eyes caught a glimpse of something down by his feet. Looking harder he saw it was a tiny chair and what looked like a dresser. He knelt down and picked up the dresser, confused. Was it a toy? Why was it so small? Ellie didn't have toys this small did she? They'd be far too small to play with at her size. "Ellie…. What is this?"

Looking up he saw she was holding something in her hand. A phone? There was a flash of light and Jack's world rushed upwards from him. He had dropped the chair as he fell and it was now big enough for him to sit on. He heard a low resounding laughter roll over the desk like thunder from the heavens. He looked up to see Ellie, but she was the size of a mountain range!

Ellie felt such a rush of excitement course through her young body seeing a person shrink. He was so tiny it was like viewing a small bug. She extended her finger and nudged him ever so slightly. He fell over circling his arms comically before landing on his ass. Before he could recover, she placed her fingertip on him and rolled him around like a speck. She giggled as she felt him beneath her fingertip, trying to free himself. She plucked him between fingertip and thumb and brought him up to her face so she could see him better. Jack fought the vice like grip of the fingers against him. He pounded his fists as hard as he could against Ellie's thick finger pads. He actually hurt his hands rather than even a tiniest reaction from her. He stared at her face as she brought him closer. At this size Ellie was less an eight year old little girl than she was a god. He had trouble taking in her entire face at once. He could only concentrate of parts at a time.

The young goddess giggled and it reverberated over him like thunderous wave. "I think I like people this teeny tiny." Ellie's deep overwhelming voice said. "You're like a little bug."

Jack started to scream up at her but all she heard were tiny high pitched squeaks. She stood up and Jack watched as the already distant floor zoomed even further. It was like he was launched in a rocket on it's way to the moon. At first he wanted Ellie to let him go, but now he clung to her finger for his life. Ellie opened her door and crept to her sister's bedroom. Jenna's room was empty and Ellie spied her sister's favorite slip-on Vans on the floor. She squatted over them, holding her captive over the shoe's opening.

"You love my sister so much, you can have her…." Ellie said as she dropped the tiny man into the shoe. Jack plummeted down and bounced off the cushion of the heel of the sneaker. He quickly got to his feet and ran to the high wall of the shoe's heel as he stared up through the opening. All around him was the musty scent of the girl's foot odor.

"Ellie! Let me out of here!" Jack screamed up at the young face hovering above. Either she heard and was ignoring or his voice was too faint to hear.

Ellie leaned closer as her face filled the small opening. "What's the matter? I thought you loved my sister." Ellie laughed. She sniffed the shoe and momentarily was aggravated. Even Miss Perfect's shoe didn't really even stink. But she pretended it did anyway by pinching her nose. "Eww….!"

"Please, Ellie don't leave me here!" Jack pleaded.

Ellie stood up and smiled as she turned to leave her sister's room, she bumped into Jenna. "What are you doing?" Jenna asked, chuckling at how awkward her little sister looked like she'd just been caught doing something.

"Nothing." Ellie said sharply, realizing she may have said it too abruptly. "I was…. just seeing what you were doing." She glanced down at Jenna's Vans and saw Jack was too tiny to see from their vantage.

"Just took a shower. Why whats up?" Jenna said as she walked to her bed and started brushing her hair.

"Nothing." Ellie said as she leaned beside her bed. "Doing anything tomorrow?"

"Yeah. I'm meeting my new friend at the mall." Jenna said. A clear smile was forming as she said it. Ellie giggled and it made Jenna blush. "Would you stop? It's not like that."

Jenna's secret attraction to girls was a secret to her mother, but she always assumed Ellie noticed. Their time with Polly only confirmed it. To Ellie there was no stigma to liking girls. At her age she found liking boys just as weird. She was just glad to see her big sister finally smiling again.

A day at the mall. That was a lot of walking. She smirked as she walked by the shoes on her way out the door.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Tinier Jack

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Jenna woke the next morning excited for her day with Miku. They were to meet at the mall between their homes and make a day of it. It had actually been a very long time since she'd gone out of the house. An even longer time since she'd gone out of the house with a friend that wasn't riding in her pocket. She spent a considerable amount of time picking out her clothes. She wanted to look just right. Ellie, for some reason, came and helped her suggesting she wore her Vans. Ellie seemed adamant about them for some reason. Jenna thought about it but finally settled on her sandals.

When Ellie heard that she panicked. She left the room in a hurry and started rummaging through her bedroom. She had to think fast. She thought of 'accidentally' spilling something on her sandals, but then she saw it. Grinning she grabbed it and ran back to her sister's room. Jenna had gone into her bathroom and was putting on makeup. Ellie stooped down by her sister's Vans and fished out the tiny man who was frantically trying to escape. Holding the squirming mini she took the item she nabbed from her pocket. It was a bit of dental floss that she had missed her waste basket with. She tied it around Jack, pinning his arms to his side. Then she tied him to the strap on the sandal that went between the toes. She had trouble concentrating on her knot because Jack was so tiny and he was fighting her. But eventually he was secured and Ellie giggled just watching him struggle. She snapped the excess floss off just in time to hear Jenna finishing in the bathroom. She hoped Jenna wouldn't feel him and he'd be stuck there the entire outing.

Jenna came out and saw as Ellie left her room. She entered her closet and stood staring at her clothes. She finally settled on her jean shorts with the decorative pockets that hung below the short frayed hem, and a top that hung off her shoulders and revealed her toned midriff. She debated on wearing something that might show too much skin like this on their first day together, but she came to the conclusion she wanted to just be herself regardless and this was how she dressed. It wasn't slutty or too revealing for a hot summer day, she just didn't want to be psychologically putting herself out there so soon. But she liked Miku. And this was her day to get back to being social.

Jenna pulled her phone out of her back pocket and texted, "OMW now". A few seconds later her phone chimed. "OK" followed by a string of cute emoji, making Jenna smile. Even her texts were adorable. She knelt down and grabbed her sandals.

Jack struggled against the floss and the leather strap against his back. He watched as the giant Ellie stood and left him trapped as he scanned the room for the other giantess. All he saw were random immense shapes and shadows cast over him. If he couldn't somehow get this girl's attention he was sure to perish on her shoe. He saw Jenna loom over her shoe and he started to scream and struggle like mad, trying to get her attention. Jenna's great form leaned over his sandal and her fingers gripped the heel strap and lifted. The titanic girl lifted her shoes by their heels and carried them to her bed. The tilt of the shoe made Jack dangle from the strap as he kicked and fought to free himself even if it meant falling from such a great height. The shoes rocked back and forth as Jenna walked across her room. He looked over his shoulder up the shoe at the long cushioned sole from the toe strap and then up the long body of the gigantic teen as he screamed desperately.

Jenna dropped the sandals at her feet and sat on her bed. She slid her foot into one shoe and was about to slid her second. Jack felt the shoe crash down onto the floor and it knocked the wind from his chest. Finally on an even keel he struggled to get his bearings again. He saw out of the corner of his eye a huge mass slide beside him. Looking over he saw a gigantic foot scooting into the sandal beside his. He started to scream but stopped when he felt his sandal begin to shift. He tried looking behind him but the strap got in the way. Then two massive walls slid on either side of him. They stopped just short and he shot his eyes up and saw the underside of the nail of Jenna's big toe. Looking to his left he saw the polished nail of her second. The toes scrunched and gripped the sandal as they scooted into place, causing the strap Jack was tied to to become wedged between the massive toes. He wasn't even tall enough to see over them. He was hidden down between them, away from eyes to see his predicament. Jack realized there was no way she'd hear him down here.

Jenna did the little buckle on both the ankle straps and she stood admiring her favorite shoes. She grabbed her hand bag and left her room. Outside her door she met Ellie who seemed to be waiting for her. Her little sister seemed to be eyeing her feet when she looked up and met Jenna's eyes, grinning.

"Leaving now?" Ellie asked.

"Uh…. yeah." Jenna said as she looked at her oddly. Ellie hugged her, surprising Jenna who hugged her back. "What was that for?" Jenna laughed.

Ellie just shrugged. "Just glad you're happy again."

Jenna blushed a little and hugged Ellie again. "Thanks." Ellie watched as Jenna left. Her eyes never leaving her big sister's feet.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Jenna's Shoe Prisoner

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Polly woke in her bed. Sitting up she stretched and yawned deeply as she pushed aside her blanket. Swinging her legs over the side she grinned when her feet touched floor. It was nice being in a bed she fit perfectly in. Not some makeshift box of napkins. She got up and walked to the edge of her bedroom floor and looked across to see that Miku was already up and not in bed. Then she saw her huge form pass by her desk. She was holding her tablet and mumbling to herself as she paced the floor.

"Morning, Miku." Polly called out.

The giant girl looked briefly her way, smiled, and went back to her mumbling. A giant finger came and tickled Polly's cheek before Miku paced her floor again. Polly saw that she had an earbud in and was listening to something on her tablet. The tiny woman shrugged and crossed the little hallway and entered her bathroom. She hiked up her nightie and sat on her toy toilet and did her business. Modesty was no longer an issue between the two. Polly finished and walked to her sink and washed her hands and splashed water on her face a bit. Opening her eyes she noticed Miku's hand entered and lifted the toy toilet to clean it out, never really taking her attention off whatever it was on her tablet. Polly grimaced as she saw the girl dutifully taking care of her potty. She REALLY wished there was a better way.

"Sorry…." Polly apologized. Before the hand cleared the room Miku brushed Polly's cheek lovingly with the back of her finger.

Polly watched her leave her room and close the door on her way to the family bathroom. Walking down the stairs she could smell food from her kitchen. Polly saw on her kitchen table was a small plate loaded with various bits of breakfast food. Beside that was a rather large glass of juice. She smiled at the layout, but something about being shrunk made her never very hungry. It was almost as if she didn't need as much food at her size. She rarely ate because she needed to. She only ever did because she wanted to. It still was more a psychological thing rather than a bodily one. She did to seem normal and pretend nothing about her had changed aside from height. She did drink a lot, though. Which explained why Miku mostly just rinsed out pee and not…. the other, as often.

Miku returned and replaced the tiny toilet and sat at her desk. She pulled out the earbud and set down her tablet.

"Hello, Yosei. It is good to see you today." Miku said almost robotic.

"Uh…. Hi Miku." Polly said with a look of confusion.

"How are you doing today? You look very nice today." Miku replied.

"Miku…. Have you lost your mind?" Polly asked, chuckling.

"What?" Miku said, worry on her face. "Was…. not good?"

Polly realized she was learning the language. Looking at the huge tablet she saw exercises on English. "Oh!" Polly exclaimed. "Miku, that was very good." Miku's face lit up and she smiled. "Wow…. You're actually getting pretty good at this. I guess I haven't noticed the gradual improvement till now."

Miku worked Polly's response in her head and then smiled and nodded. "Yes. I learn." She said proudly. "I always practice."

Polly did realize whenever she wasn't fully attending her she was buried in her tablet. She thought Miku was simply playing a game on it. But still, the comprehension seemed amazing.

"Miku…. Are you a genius?" Polly asked. Miku sat for a minute, then blushed and shook her head. "Seriously?" Polly asked in disbelief. Miku hid her giggle behind her hand and then with the same hand made a gesture indicating 'a little'. "Geez…" Polly said in slight amazement, although not completely surprised. She noticed early on that this young girl seemed smart beyond her years. "Wish I was. Then I could learn your language." She looked down at her dangling feet. "I'm sorry you have to learn my mess of a language."

"Gomennasai" Miku said, cutting off Polly who looked at her confused.

"What?" Polly asked.

"Gomennasai" Miku repeated and then gestured to Polly to repeat it.

"Go….men…" Polly tried.

"Go men nah sai." Miku enunciated.

"Gomennasai?" Polly muttered. Miku clapped and smiled. "What does that mean?"

"I am sorry." Miku answered. "Very good, Yosei." She patted the little blonde's head.

"I'm not quite there yet, Miku." Polly said as she laughed. It felt good to learn something, though. Even if it was just one phrase. But it WAS a phrase she tended to say a lot.

Miku's phone chimed and she practically jumped for it. She got a text and Polly had a feeling it was her new friend from the look on her cute face. She got up and started removing her bed clothes.

"Going out?" Polly asked. Miku giggled and nodded. "Your new friend?" Again same giggle. Same nod. Miku stopped and stood up with a concerned look on her face. Polly failed to notice because her giant friend was standing in her bra and panties.

"Yosei…." Miku said as she walked to her desk. "New friend….. but still…. love Yosei. That not changing."

Polly's attention snapped from the wall of panty covered crotch at eye level. She looked up at Miku and just waved her hand dismissively. "I know, Miku. I'm not jealous. Have fun." Polly assured her. "Just could you put my house on the floor? Don't want to feel trapped all day on your desk."

She watched as Miku lifted her house and set it on her floor and slid it under her bed out of sight. It never ceased to amaze Polly to watch a young 'small' girl like Miku to lift her entire home like the proverbial dollhouse that it was with such effortless ease. She sometimes forgot how immensely powerful these giants were.

Miku opened her hand and presented it to her little friend. Polly hopped on and was lowered to Miku's socked feet. Standing back up the young girl resumed dressing. Polly watched from the floor in wonder as the huge preteen settled on her clothes. She could see her indecision until she decided on a short pink and black tartan pleated skirt and a shirt with Japanese writing and some cute anime drawing. She slipped her feet into her white Keds and was all set to leave when she noticed her hair had gotten messed and brushed it again. Whoever this new person was, Miku strives to look her best for her. Polly had said she wasn't jealous, but now she kind of was. The giant girl spun around to face the tiny woman on her floor.

"Bye bye, Yosei." She grinned as she left her room and closed the door. Polly sat in her little living room and huffed at her surroundings. She'd like to go out around town with Miku and her new friend, too. She almost wished she could just reveal herself to the world so she could have a semi normal life with Miku. But she knew the folly of such a thought. She'd be taken from her and never to be seen again if she did.

She got up and began moving her furniture around to back where it went after getting jostled being lowered to the floor.

As she was shoving her sofa back into place she heard the bedroom door open. Thinking Miku forgot something she cane out from under the bed and saw a much larger form standing in the doorway. She turned to run back under the cover of Miku's bed but slipped and fell. She scrambled to her feet and darted for her house. She stood hoping whoever it was hadn't seen her.

'Stupid stupid stupid' she reprimanded herself in her head.

She'd gotten so used to being alone with Miku that she'd become complacent, and that could be dangerous. She could feel the floor as she saw two huge feet come beside the bed in front of her. They stopped right where she had dove for cover. She hid behind her sofa just as she realized who's feet they belonged to. She recognized the slender toes and the immaculate polish job that was more than likely a professional pedicure. She saw the feet bend and two knees crashed to the floor, shaking her house. Then a face appeared searching under the bed.

It was Kanami's lovely face. Eyes wide and mouth slightly ajar. Polly hid behind the sofa. Where could she go? She was trapped. She eyed the window and cursed that it was just for show and didn't actually open. Then two massive hands gripped each side of the house and Polly felt it drag across the floor out into the open. She panicked as she felt the house lift off the floor and into the air. Out the cursed window she watched as Miku's room flew by until she saw the familiar items on Miku's desk.

The house landed on the desk and Polly dared to take a peek over her hiding place. Kanami's eyes were scanning the house when she locked eyes with Polly. The tiny woman dove back down behind the couch.

'No no no' she thought in her head.

Then giant fingers crept over head and gripped the sofa and she watched as the furniture was pulled away leaving her exposed. Kanami dropped the little sofa and screamed before clamping her hand over her mouth.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Miku Prepares for Jenna

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Polly sat exposed to the giant sister of her friend. Kanami just sat crouched at Miku's desk staring unblinking into the small house. She had finally stopped screaming into her muffled hand but was now breathing quickly and ragged. She began to spout quick Japanese in shock as she stared at a six inch woman. Polly realized she needed to calm the situation before Kanami did something drastic like show her mother.

"Uh…. Hi Kanami." Polly said as she stood and waved. The huge teen's eyes widened at the sound of her name.

{"How do you know my name?!"} Kanami blurted in Japanese. She only knew a handful of words in English having barely passed the course. She figured why learn the language when as soon as she was graduated she was moving back to Japan with her friends? But hearing her name come out of this tiny creature was very off putting.

Polly, not understanding anything from her, continued. "My name is Polly. I'm a friend of your sister, Miku."

Kanami then heard her sister's name and sudden realization set in. She was in Miku's room, of course she'd know her sister. Then she really recognized something familiar about this tiny thing. Then her mouth fell open as she gasped. Language barrier or not, Polly saw and understood what just happened. Kanami remembered.

{"Oh my god…. It's you!"} Kanami screamed as the revelation made her lose her balance and fall backwards onto her ass. {"You're real?!"}

"Uh…. You remember me?" Polly said, basically to herself really since neither understood each other. She walked towards the edge of the desk as she held up her hands to try and calm the young giantess.

{"No no no….. I just imagined you!"} Kanami started to shake visibly.

Polly felt horrible for her. "Please, Kanami just calm down."

{"Stop saying my name!"} The teen cried out as she held her head in her hands and clenched her eyes shut.

Kanami felt unimaginable guilt when that drunken night happened so long ago. She thought she imagined it but something made her still feel guilty just the same. It took a long time for her to stop thinking about that horrible night and to come to terms with how real she imagined it. She thought she was going crazy because it had seemed so real. She only recently was allowing herself to forget it and move on. And now, in front of her, was that tiny thing again. Was she imagining her again? Was she in fact going mad?! Polly watched as the giant teenager rocked back and forth muttering to herself and weeping.

"Please, Kanami… I'm so sorry!" She said as she stood at the edge of the desk staring down at her. Even though it was her that had been violated that night, she hated to see this girl punishing herself. Then she remembered Miku.

"Gommenasai….?" Polly said hoping she remembered correctly. Kanami stopped rocking for a moment. She looked up at Polly from under her long hair that had fallen over her face. Polly felt the need to try something else and so she bowed. She hoped it would vaguely convey her intentions at least a little bit. When she stood back up she saw that Kanami had stopped crying and was wiping her eyes. It was a start.

{"Y....you understand me?"} The teen asked. Polly just shrugged awkwardly. {"You don't. If I'm imagining you... wouldn't I imagine you not being so dumb?"} She reasoned. She stood and pulled the computer chair under her and sat. {"What if I am going crazy? Why do I keep seeing you?"}

Polly could detect the questioning lilt at the end of Kanami's sentences and wished she could answer her but she just stood there staring. The teen pulled her chair slowly closer to the desk. Polly stepped back as the teen began to loom over her. Kanami had to know. Was she real? Was all this another hallucination? She brought up her hand, visibly shaking and slowly reached for Polly.

The tiny woman saw the teen's hand make its way towards her but she stood her ground. If she didn't display any fear perhaps the giant girl wouldn't either. Kanami's hand paused right before contact. She rubbed her fingers together as if preparing to touch something unsavory. Polly watched as Kanami's giant finger touched her shoulder. It jerked back, almost not expecting her to be real. Kanami poked Polly in the chest. The small woman winced a bit but smiled. Polly held up her hand. Kanami saw this and pressed her fingertip into her palm and Polly gripped it with her tiny fingers in response. Kanami giggled for a brief moment in wonder before returning to her serious state. They held each other's embrace for a minute as the teen grew accustomed to such a strange event…. Almost holding hands with a tiny six inch woman.

{"This is crazy…."} Kanami said breathlessly. {"I think you are real after all."} Her hand dropped and landed with a thud at Polly's feet. Tears began welling up again and Kanami was shamefully shaking her head. {"I'm so sorry…. For what I did to you. I…. I didn't know what I was doing. That's no excuse, but…. I'm just so sorry."}

Polly worried what was making this giant teen so upset but recognized her one known phrase repeated by Kanami. She gathered that she still felt guilt from that night. Polly wanted to hurriedly console her so she knelt down and stroked her hand.

Kanami jumped a tiny bit when she felt her hand unexpectedly touched. She watched as this small creature caressed her hand and smiled up at her. She was still convinced she was going crazy, and this scene of affection wasn't helping.

{"I'm going to touch you, ok?"} Kanami said slowly as if that would break the language barrier.

The teenager raised her finger up and brushed through Polly's long blonde hair. She fondled it between her fingers, amazed at how fine and soft it was. The finger glided down and touched her shoulder before slowly moving down the length of her arm. Polly stood as still as possible as she watched the slender index finger glide down her arm and gently gripped her wrist. Kanami raised her arm and moved it around as if it were attached to a small doll. She tugged a bit on it making Polly finally break her stillness and spin around. Her backside was facing the teen as her arm was held up preventing her from moving. Kanami was examining her clothes. She turned Polly back facing her with an arched eyebrow.

{"What in the world are you wearing?"} Kanami asked almost laughing.

Polly was still in her nightie. The pink fluffy trimmed babydoll number that barely covered her nethers. Just now remembering that, her face burned red and she tried to free her hand from Kanami's fingers to cover herself. The teen barely even noticed her struggle but released her wrist anyway. Her finger and thumb pinched the hem of her nightie and rubbed it between them.

{"This is so gaudy…."} Kanami chuckled. The girl lifted the hem a bit examining it when she lifted it far enough to expose Polly's little bush underneath. She gasped and released the hem red faced.

{"Oh my god. What the Hell?"} Kanami blurted.

Both sat embarrassed and silent avoiding eye contact. It was Kanami who broke the silence when Polly saw the girl's finger return and creep towards her hem again. Polly held her hands out to stop it but the sheer power difference meant nothing to the teen. Kanami did hide a smirk however at how effortlessly she prodded on despite Polly's objections. The girl's finger brushed aside the little nightie and saw the most adorable little tuft of hair between two squirming thighs.

Kanami withdrew her finger and watched as the little thing straightened her nightgown again. That little flash of naughtiness sent returning memories of that drunken night back in her head. She winced and breathed heavy trying to shove them away. She took her phone out and looked at the time. Turning she glanced at the bedroom door. She looked down at Polly and nibbled on her lip as she ran things through her head. Then she slowly reached her open hand for Polly. The small blonde watched as Kanami's slender hand wrapped around her.

"Oh…. uh…. Kanami, wait." Polly said as giant manicured fingers closed around her. "Kanami, please…. I think it's better if I stay here."

Polly worried Kanami was going to show her to their mother. Or that she was going to want another round from that drunken night. But try as she would she just felt her feet leave the desk and rise into the air. Kanami held Polly close to her chest as she quietly opened the door and left Miku's room.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Kanami Meets Polly

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Jenna sat at on a bench outside the mall as she waited for Miku. She was looking forward to this ever since they brought it up while texting each other. It had been a very long time since she'd been out with a friend. Long before losing Polly. Since the incident with Angelica. Both incidents made her uneasy to think about. But no. Nothing was going to ruin her day with Miku. As she sat waiting she fiddled with her phone in her hand and nervously tapped her foot.

Unknown to Jenna, but down on her foot there was a tiny man forced to endure every nervous movement her foot was making. Tied securely to the toe strap, Jack had ridden along as the teen's foot rose and fell with each step from home. Each return to the ground with every step he was jarred violently. He craned his neck up to catch glimpses of this mountain of a girl but never saw more than a fleeting glance amid the steep slope of her body as she walked. He gave up screaming for attention. There was no way she was going to hear from way up there. He tried to kick at the toes beside him but it didn't even register a response from the behemoth girl. That was the walk and bus ride here. Now he was on her sandal as she dangled it off her foot as she sat and waited. The walking had, for now at least, stopped and he was just left with the jiggling and jostling of a girl's foot as she waited.

The noon sun was beating down and in between the two body heat generating toes, Jack was in danger if getting heat stroke. In his daze he saw a large drop of sweat trickle down Jenna's tan skin in front of him. He licked his lips and looked beside him at the girl's big toe. He could see droplets of sweat, making him lick his dry lips again. Jack strained against his bindings as he reached his face closer. The slack was just enough and he pressed his lips against the side of Jenna's toe. He sucked on the sweat and dragged his tongue along the soft leather like skin. The girl's perspiration was warm and salty but wet and was a glorious relief to his parched lips and throat.

Jenna scanned the sidewalk in front of the mall for her friend, and then she saw her. She jumped up and waved and Miku saw her and waved back. Butterflies were having a field day in her stomach. Seeing hiw Miku dressed today didn't help. She was decked out as cute as possible in her pink and black tartan skirt and anime shirt. Jenna didn't think she could ever pull off something so unabashedly young and girlie herself. But on Miku it looked not one bit out of place. The Japanese girl practically skipped down the sidewalk to her and Jenna's heart skipped a few beats. She was just so cute.

Finally reaching Jenna, Miku bowed. "Hi Jenna!" She said as she rose.

"Hi!" Jenna said rather loudly, giving away her enthusiasm. "Um…. Do I bow? Is that the right thing to do when we meet? I'm not sure."

"You can. Yes." Miku said. She watched Jenna go into a deep overly formal bow and she giggled. "Maybe…. not so much."

"Oh…." Jenna said blushing.

The two went about mulling around the various stores as they talked. Miku mostly listened and tried to keep up with Jenna talking a mile a minute in a language she was still struggling with. She didn't mind. Miku could tell Jenna seemed to need this as much as she did. More maybe. Although she couldn't imagine why. Jenna looked like a girl who would be the leader of her own exclusive clique. Yet she was extremely approachable and down to earth. Miku found just listening to her was fascinating. She didn't have many friends let alone American friends. She just listened to her, smiling at the string of slang and terms she didn't quite understand yet. She was becoming enamored with this tall blonde.

At the end of their day as they said their goodbyes, Jenna reached out for Miku's hand in a friendly gesture. Immediately she felt she'd gone too far, but Miku gently squeezed her hand back in reciprocation before they let go. As they walked their seperate ways home they both caught each other looking back repeatedly. Every time it made Jenna smile like a little girl and wave and every time it was answered with Miku giggling and waving back.

Down between Jenna's toes, Jack was a mess. An entire day between two massive toes, being slammed around as the titanic teen playfully walked around the mall, had left him drained and bruised. He was barely aware of another girl with her as his main focus was survival. As she finally sat still on the bus ride home he took advantage of it by drinking a bit more of Jenna's trickling sweat that had made its way down the valley between her toes. If it wasn't for Jenna sweating a tiny bit he surely wouldn't have survived. A few more minutes of earth shaking footsteps later the teen was back home and trudging up the stairs to her room. Jenna kicked off her sandals and fell onto her bed exhausted and happy.

Ellie was waiting on pins and needles for her big sister to return. Hearing her she rushed to Jenna's door. "Hey…. How was your date?" Ellie grinned.

"Ellie… it wasn't a date." Jenna laughed.

The young girl looked down at Jenna's sandal but couldn't see it's tiny passenger. "Fine. How was your not date?" Ellie angled trying to see Jack.

"It was pretty awesome. Miku is fun to hang out with." Jenna said clearly smiling broadly. "She's kinda quiet though. I think I talked her ear off."

"I thought you said she didn't speak English." Ellie walked to Jenna's bed and sat.

"I said she doesn't speak a lot of English. Obviously she knows some." Jenna laughed. "She knows enough."

Ellie glanced at Jenna's foot as if she was going to find Jack stuck between her toes. "My feet are killing me, though. I love my sandals but they're not ideal for long days on your feet. I should have just wore my Vans." Jenna said flexing her feet. Suddenly she felt Ellie's hands on her foot. "What….. Ellie?!"

"What?" Ellie asked as she held her big sister's foot in her hands. "I'm gonna massage them for you."

"Eww!" Jenna said as she tried to pull her foot away. "That's weird. Stop."

"Let me help…" Ellie said as she began squeezing and rubbing Jenna's foot. The teen struggled but eventually stopped. "Feel better?"

"Uh…. Yeah actually." Jenna said a little embarrassed. "Thanks. But really you don't have to."

Ellie just smiled and kept working. The little sister was simply showing her appreciation to her big sister who unknowingly punished her tiny pet man all day. Soon Jenna, drained from her lovely day with Miku, drifted off. Ellie gently placed her foot on her bed and crept to the sandal. Picking it up she finally saw tiny Jack tied to the toe strap. She grinned as her giant fingers easily snapped the thin thread holding him.

"I can't believe you made it home." Ellie whispered. She plucked him off the sandal and then brought it up and sniffed it. Barely an odor. She frowned. "You probably just enjoyed it. I'll have to think of something better next time."

Jack hung limp between her finger and thumb. He was actually glad to see the huge girl. He wanted nothing more than to be away from Jenna's footwear.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Jenna and Miku's 'Not Date'

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kanami sat in her room preoccupied by her phone as Polly stood on her desk trying to get her attention. How anything on that blasted phone could be any more fascinating than a newly discovered six inch woman was beyond Polly. "Kanami, please…. I need to be back in Miku's room." Polly repeated.

Kanami would just occasionally look up from her phone and then ignore her again. Polly knew she had no idea what she was saying but she'd at least thought her sister's name would give a hint. So either she was absolutely clueless or she was just ignoring her. She put money on the latter. "Kanami!" Polly shouted as she stomped her little foot.

The giant teen looked up with a frown on her pretty face and tapped her finger across her lips indicating to hush. "Kanami I need to go!" Polly said as she pointed towards the door.

The girl looked at her for a moment and then wrapped her hand around her. Polly was momentarily relieved until she was simply lowered to the floor and released. Kanami looked down at her and repeated her hush gesture and went back to her phone. Polly stood on the floor staring up at her in disbelief. The tiny blonde turned and started walking towards the bedroom door. Kanami's huge foot came from behind and arched beside her and nudged her back. Polly again diverted away from the foot and made a faster line for the door. Again Kanami used her foot to corral her back.

{"If you don't behave down there you're going back on the desk."} Kanami warned.

Polly was having none of whatever she was saying and juked around her foot again. Kanami huffed and slammed her phone onto her lap. Polly thought she was clear but then she was pushed to the floor by the girl's enormous foot. The tiny woman was on her stomach pressed onto the wood floor by the teen's dainty yet massive foot. She felt Kanami's slender toes curl down and grip her shoulders, her head wedged between her big and second toe, as the foot started to drag her back. It stopped when it met beside her other foot and directly in front of the seated teen. Polly started to struggle to get up but the foot remained rested on top of her. Kanami was somehow at least not allowing the full weight of her foot on Polly. Just enough. She began to lightly raise and lower her foot in a gentle tapping as she seemingly played with the small blonde. Polly felt the ball of Kanami's foot and toes as they repeatedly pounded lightly on her back.

"Ow ow ow!" Polly yelped. She felt the teen's foot immediately lift away. She wasn't actually being hurt but she was relieved to know Kanami didn't intend to do actual harm and stopped when she thought she was. Polly scrambled to her feet and looked up at the seated young giantess who was leaned forward with her elbows on her knees looking down at her.

{"I didn't mean to hurt you."} Kanami said as her hand lowered to Polly. It cupped behind Polly's rear like a ski lift chair and lifted her up seated in her palm. Polly gripped the long slender fingers to steady herself as she rose in the air. Brought to Kanami's lovely face, the teen began turning her this way and that looking for damage. {"You seem alright."} Kanami said with a frown. {"You're a little faker, aren't you?"} Kanami took her finger of her other hand and tickled Polly's feet. The tiny blonde kicked her legs laughing.

"Kanami?!" Polly laughed. The teen was still weirded out by this thing knowing her name but she could see the appeal Miku more than likely had for it. She was kind of cute in a weird way. Smiling, Kanami lowered her hand back to the desk and allowed Polly to hop off.

{"Are you going to behave now?"} Kanami asked. Polly just stood staring at her. The teenager rolled her eyes and resumed her attention to her phone.

Later they both heard Miku return and both got excited but for different reasons. Kanami put her phone down and sat legs crossed facing her door in anticipation. They could hear the beginnings of frantic searching in the room next door. Polly looked up at Kanami and the teen had crossed her arms and was tapping her fingers.

"Kanami?!" They heard Miku scream. The younger sister burst into her big sister's room. Miku's eyes darted around the floor and then room until they fell on the tiny woman on Kanami's desk. She looked at Kanami guilty but then made a move for Polly. Kanami snatched the tiny woman from her desk, stopping Miku.

{"You knew…."} Kanami said calmly but failing to hide the underlying anger.

{"Kanami, please give her to me."} Miku said reaching for her, avoiding the accusation.

{"You knew!"} Kanami yelled, her anger bursting behind her words. Her hands tightened around Polly in anger unconsciously making the tiny woman squirm in discomfort. Polly chose to remain quiet as the two giantess talked heated words to each other. She had no idea what was being said but it was obviously about her. She watched as Miku backed away sheepishly, her face displaying her shame.

{"You knew this thing was real and you lied to me!"} Kanami stood and advanced on her little sister. {"You know how long I dealt with the guilt of that night! Blaming myself for something I thought was in my head! Thinking I was going crazy! It was so real…. and now…"} Kanami held out her fist holding Polly. {"…. it's real! I can't believe you let me think I was crazy! How could you?!"}

{"I'm sorry!"} Miku yelled back, fighting back tears. {"I was protecting her…. I didn't want anyone to know about her."}

{"What about me?! What about protecting me?! Your sister…. you let me think I was losing my goddamn mind!"} Kanami shot back. {"And it's not a HER it's a THING!"} The teen shook her hand to emphasize.

{"She's a person, Kanami…. not a thing!"} Miku corrected. She reached her hands out to take the confused and shaken little woman. Kanami raised her long arm up into the air out of reach of her diminutive sister. {"Kanami stop! You're scaring her!"}

{"It! I'm scaring IT! And good…. The two of you lying to me this whole time."} Kanami pushed her smaller sister away as she held her fist up high.

{"Please, let me have her…. Please…."} Miku asked with tears streaming her cheeks.

Kanami hated seeing her little sister upset and as angry at her as she was she relented and lowered her hand and opened it allowing Polly to sit in her palm. Miku grabbed her a bit too forcefully but didn't want to lose the opportunity. Holding the confused little woman in her hands, Miku looked her over.

"You… ok, Yosei?" Miku asked.

"Yeah…. Just confused. What's going on, Miku?" Polly asked.

{"You understand it?"} Kanami asked. A look of distaste on her face as she looked down at Polly.

{"It's just English. You took it more semesters than I have, why don't you?"} Miku snarked back.

Kanami snorted a laugh. {"Why? I'm not sticking around soon anyway."}

Miku didn't want to think of the time Kanami has been threatening to move back to Japan. She didn't want to lose her big sister, her only real friend till Polly and Jenna. Miku turned her attention back to her tiny friend. "She hurt you?" She asked as she stroked her hair with her finger.

"No, Kanami was gentle with me. But...." Polly assured.

{"Why did you teach it my name? It's creepy."} Kanami interrupted.

{"Stop talking about her like she's a thing."} Miku shot back again. Then her face fell regretful. {"I never meant to lie to you, Nami. I just… I couldn't tell you. I couldn't tell anyone."}

{"Because she made you?"} Kanami asked, almost in disbelief she'd listen to orders from something small enough to fit in her hands.

{"Yes. But no…. We both agreed it was best."} Miku finally looked back into her sister's eyes. {"Nami, they'd take her…. and …. do things to her. You know they would."}

{"They who?!"} Kanami asked.

{"Grown ups. Police…. scientist…. You know….. people."} Miku said holding Polly closer to her. Kanami was quiet as she considered Miku's words. She saw how much this weird little creature meant to her little sister so she backed off for now. {"You won't tell mom, will you?"} Miku asked.

Kanami laughed, throwing Miku off at the sudden mood change. {"Why would I tell mom!"} Kanami said still chuckling. {"I'd be in way more trouble over this than you if I did."}

Miku understood what she meant. Kanami may be the belle of the ball outside in the world, but here in their house she was responsible for everything that happens when their mother is away. Miku bent down and set Polly at their feet and stood back up and wrapped her arms around her big sister. Kanami acted as though she was being assaulted but caved and hugged her back.

{"We really are sorry we lied to you, Nami."} Miku said muffled against her sisters chest.

The teen sighed in defeat. She never was able to stay made at her for long. {"It's ok, I guess…."} Kanami said back as she mussed Miku's hair. {"You had reasons, I guess. Just…. No more lies ok?"} Polly watched it all from between both of their feet below. She had tears in her eyes and she didn't even know what was being said. The two giantesses finished their hug and looked down at her.

{"So…. you found a six inch tall woman, eh? Whe----wait a minute. Did you call it a yosei?!"} Kanami asked.

Miku took a deep breath. This was going to be a long story…
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Confessions to Kanami

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Miku told how she found Polly in the street three inches tall. How she has no memory of her past or her name. How she took her in and, despite the language barrier, became very close friends with her. How she mysteriously grew another three inches. Protected and cared for her. Clothed her and gave her a home. The entire time Kanami sat silent and dumbfounded. When Miku had reached the current events she stopped and they both stood staring at each other. Polly, still on the floor, stared up in complete confusion not understanding a word other than her name occasionally.

{"Well….?"} Miku asked, breaking the silence.

{"I…"} Kanami started but shook her head. {"Miku, people don't just shrink."}

{"Yosei did."} Miku replied. Kanami just shook her head at Miku's answer. The youngest giantess knelt down and picked Polly up. {"Let's go back to my room."} Miku told Polly and Kanami. {"Her little house is there."}

All three returned to Miku's room and the girl set the house back and straightened it on her desk before depositing the little woman on her bed. Kanami watched all this with a look of incredulous disbelief. Her little sister was taking care of a tiny creature that resembled an adult woman like she was a doll…. Or more accurately, a pet animal. She watched the small woman move around her small home from a distance. When Polly walked to the edge of the second floor, Kanami instinctively rushed her hand level with it.

{"What? What happened?"} Miku looked in worried.

{"I…. I thought she was going to fall."} Kanami said embarrassed.

{"She?"} Miku said smiling. Kanami blushed a shade deeper.

"Miku, is it ok if I change clothes? I feel kind of silly still in my bed outfit." Polly asked.

"Ok." Miku said. {"She wants to change so…."} Miku motioned for her sister to turn around as they both gave Polly privacy.

When Polly cleared her throat they turned around to see her wearing the light yellow sun dress. Kanami's mouth slacked a bit. The teen would have been blind to not see how amazing this tiny person looked in it. Seeing her alluring like that reminded her of that night.

{"Miku…. Could you tell her something for me?"} Kanami asked almost in a whisper. Miku nodded, eager to hear her big sister and her little friend become better acquainted. {"Tell her…. I'm sorry. For that night…"}

Miku thought for a minute. {"You should tell her."} She said. {"You must know at least that much English."}

She did, but Kanami had hoped Miku would so she could avoid eye contact. But her sister was right. She held her hand even with the floor in front of Polly. Before Kanami could motion for her to come, the little woman obliged and crawled onto her open palm. Kanami was amazed to watch her obediently enter her hand with no fear and of her own accord. The teen lifted her up to her face and strained to find the courage to speak.

"I'm…. sorry." Kanami finally said. Polly looked back at Miku puzzled.

"For the night…" Miku explained. Polly looked back up at Kanami and smiled. She wrapped her arms around Kanami's thumb and hugged. The teen smiled and giggled at being forgiven. Miku joined and all three were laughing.

{"See? I told you she didn't blame you."} Miku told Kanami. {"She understands it was an accident. She's been waiting for this to happen actually. You knowing that is. But we were afraid of telling too many people. But she wanted to get to know you so badly."}

Kanami almost had tears in her eyes again, resolving this issue finally. "Thank you." She told Polly, thus ending the extent of her English knowledge. In her moving around, Kanami saw Polly again had, what looked like, no undergarments. She took her fingertip and nudged up the hem of Polly's sun dress. It moved up the tiny woman's outer thigh and revealed she was in fact panty-less.

{"Kanami?!"} Miku said in shock.

Polly felt the giant finger brushing up her hip and looked down to see her exposed bottom and Kanami's finger pushing up her dress. Getting scolded by her sister made the teen remove her finger. {"Why is she always bare assed?"} Kanami asked, diverting the subject.

{"It's just not easy finding clothes for her."} Miku explained.

Polly pulled her dress back down slowly as she looked up at Kanami smiling. The teenager deposited her back in her house and brushed her hands together as she looked at her uncomfortably. {"She's awful flirty isn't she?"} She asked. It was Miku's turn to blush now.

{"Oh…. Can you watch her tomorrow? I'm going to the movies."} Miku remembered.

{"What….?"} Kanami moaned.

{"Please? Mom will be home and I'd feel better if she was safe with you now that you know."} Miku begged as she did a purposely cute dance in place.

Kanami huffed and rolled her eyes. {"Fine."} Miku clapped and hugged her making Kanami smile as she pretended to squirm away. {"Your new gaijin friend?"}

{"Uh huh."} Miku smiled.

{"What is it with you and all these new American friends?"} Kanami asked.

{"Two?"} Miku laughed. {"Besides I really like Jenna. She's fun to hang out with."}

Kanami shrugged. {"Whatever. So does she…. need things?"} She asked staring in at the tiny woman moving around the dollhouse.

{"Not really. She might get bored or something."} Miku replied.

{"Then what? Am I supposed to entertain her?"} Kanami asked. Before Miku could reply, Kanami saw something and she let out an annoyed huff. Her hand reached in and pulled out the tiny toilet. {"What the Hell is this?"}

{"Oh…. Yeah sometimes she needs to…."} Miku said shyly.

{"Yada!"} Kanami blurted in disgust holding it by her finger and thumb. The appalled teen returned it to the bathroom and gave a slight shiver. Polly heard the commotion and saw the giant teenager's reaction as she held the toilet and felt like crawling in a hole.

{"If she does, just leave it for me I guess."} Miku said.

{"Uh, yeah… don't worry I will."} Kanami replied. She saw Polly standing in the room beside the bathroom and she could see her embarrassment from there. For some reason it made Kanami feel bad for her. The plight of this tiny woman was beginning to take shape for the teen the more she saw how she lived. Trapped in this world of giants, at the whim of a twelve year old girl to keep her safe. Now she had an apathetic eighteen year old. She tried to imagine herself in the same situation and it creeped her out. The thought of being six inches tall and relying on Miku to care for her was very unsettling. Not that her genius little sister wouldn't be a great care giver. But Kanami was always very independent and having her freedom stripped from her was nightmare enough. Perhaps she could be a bit more aware of this little person's needs if she had to.

{"You know… we can't even speak to each other."} Kanami pointed out. {"What if she needs something?"}

{"She's not dumb."} Miku laughed. {"You can play 20 Questions."}

{"I'm serious you dork. What if she gets bored or something? Am I supposed to play with her?"} Kanami asked dreading the answer.

{"No. We both know how THAT turned out."} Miku giggled.

{"That's not funny."} Kanami said dryly.

{"I don't know, Nami. Watch something on Netflix."} Miku suggested.

{"Netflix and chill…. with a six inch tall woman…."} Kanami looked in and saw Polly straightening her furniture from the earthquake the giant teen did to it earlier. {"I guess…."}

{"Honest, Nami she doesn't bite."} Miku told her. {"She's the sweetest person you'll ever meet."} It was still difficult for Kanami to think of her as a little human being. The concept of a six inch person was still a hard pill to swallow. Miku turned her attention to the little woman.

"Sorry, Yosei. Ignoring you." Miku apologized. Polly just shrugged. "Nami…. Kanami will watch tomorrow. I see a movie. With friend."

"Oh…. Ok." Polly replied as she looked at the teenager questionably.

"I leave early. Maybe…. Put house with Kanami?" Miku asked.

"Um…. if she doesn't mind. It's fine with me." Polly replied.

{"I'm leaving pretty early tomorrow. It'd probably be best if we put her in your room tonight."} Miku said to her sister. Miku knew her big sister was a late sleeper and it would save the hassle in the morning.

{"Oh…. Yeah. Does…. she not mind?"} Kanami asked, kind of amazed at the little person's trust and willingness after the last night in her room.

{"Nope. You carry Yosei, I'll get the house."} Miku skipped to her desk and got things ready. Kanami placed her hand beside Polly and the tiny woman settled into it. Kanami doubted she'd ever get used to the amazement of a tiny person climbing into her hand. She cupped her other hand around her for safety, as though she were carrying a delicate priceless heirloom. Miku saw this and smiled. She knew her big sister would care for her like she did.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Kanami and Polly's Story

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kanami lay in her bed staring at the ceiling. Miku had dropped off the dollhouse and said her goodbyes to Polly before leaving. The teen looked over at the little house and saw a light glowing through the second floor window. She should just leave the little thing alone. Let her have her privacy, what there was she could have being on display for giant eyes all the time. But she wanted to see her. Being alone now with this miniature marvel summoned her curiosity. Maybe she wouldn't mind if Kanami visited a bit. Then she had an idea. She swung her long legs over the side of her bed and crept to her closet. Rummaging through boxes she found what she was looking for and grinned.

Kanami approached her desk and stopped. How to nonchalantly suddenly appear in her home. She lightly tapped on the roof before coming into view. She saw Polly sitting on her bed as the little woman sat upright surprised to see her. Kanami smiled and waved as she sat down. Polly waved back but got up and pointed to the small book light that Miku had bought her for a bedroom light. Kanami understood she was asking if it was keeping her awake and the girl waved her hand dismissively. The giant girl pantomimed her hands by her head as if sleeping and then pointed to her shaking her head. Polly shook her head indicating she too had trouble falling asleep tonight. The teenager grinned and held up a bottle in her hand.

{"A peace offering?"} Kanami said grinning slyly. She saw Polly look at the bottle confused. {"Sake."} Kanami informed her. Polly knew that Japanese word, and her little eyes got wide. Kanami leaned down and looked in the kitchen before opening the small cupboard and finding a tiny cup. She opened the sake and poured a bit into a ceramic shot glass and then filled the cup from that. She held it for Polly in her fingers. Polly looked at it and shook her head. She remembered where the events went the last time Kanami drank. Plus she wasn't so sure she'd trust herself around the beautiful teen, too. Kanami seeing her decline, frowned. Putting the tiny cup on the desk she put her hands together begging. She put on a sad face with her bottom lip out in a playful pout.

{"I'll behave this time. I swear."} Kanami told her holding her hand up implying she was being honest. Polly thought about it and decided she wanted…. No needed a little alcohol tonight. She wanted to build a friendship with Miku's big sister and put the water under the bridge about that fateful night. Polly nodded and held out her hands. Kanami squealed and rushed the tiny cup to the little woman who was now sitting on the edge of her second floor. Polly raised her cup to Kanami who in turn did the same as she bowed a bit.

{"Kanpai!"} The teen exclaimed.

It caught Polly off guard. "Kanpai?" She asked if she was saying right.

Kanami nodded and repeated. {"Kanpai!"}

They both sipped from their glasses. Polly coughed and squinted her eyes. "Woooow…." She said as she caught her breath. "That's strong…." Kanami giggled as she took another drink. Polly felt embarrassed watching a teen handle her drink better than she was. Could it be her size made the sake stronger? She took another gulp and whistled as she took it in. Kanami poured more into her cup and held it up for Polly to dip hers into. "Kanpai!" Polly shouted.

{"Kanpai!"} Kanami returned. The teen looked down at the small cup she was sipping from and then the relative coffee mug Polly was using and shook her head snickering. {"Americans…."} Kanami said as she took another sip. Polly heard that and gave a devious little laugh as she drank more, making Kanami spray her drink from her lips laughing. The sake sprayed all over Polly as she sat laughing like a maniac. {"I'm sorry! I mean…."} "I'm sorry!" Kanami said as she tried to wipe her spittle from the tiny woman. Polly just waved away her hands as she laughed and wiped her face. Apparently, unknown to both people, Polly got very silly when she was drunk.

Kanami sat and watched her laugh and drink, occasionally mumbling something in English before giggling again. The teen felt like she was getting the family pet drunk. Polly leaned sideways and struggled to get up. She turned over on her knees as she prepared to stand. This sake was hitting her hard. Kanami wasn't too far behind her in that regard. The teen grinned as she saw the little woman's back as Polly got to her hands and knees. Kanami inhaled and blew a puff of air making Polly's tiny sun dress poof up revealing her little ass. The tiny woman squealed and pulled her dress down laughing. Kanami giggled watching her fight against her repeated bursts of blown air trying to make her dress hike up. Polly got to her feet on wobbly legs as she held her dress with one hand and her cup with another. Polly took a misstep and got dangerously close to the edge of the floor and, before Kanami could react, she fell over it. She fell one story and landed hard on the desk. The teenage gasped and rushed her hands to scoop her up. Polly sat up in the teen's soft warm hands as she continued to laugh at her clumsiness but a shooting pain was now thumping in her shoulder.

"Ha ha ha, ow ow, ha ha" Polly laughed as she held her shoulder in pain.

{"No no no…..!"} Kanami said worried. Miku left her in charge of her pet and not even one night and she got injured. Giant slender fingers began gently inspecting Polly, looking for injuries. All Kanami noticed was a slight discoloration on her little shoulder where Polly was holding her hand. The giant girl moved her finger over the area and began gently caressing it, hoping it would help.

Polly sat and enjoyed the attention and allowed Kanami to worry for her. Besides it was actually making it feel better. But the little blonde felt a new pain in her lower back on the upper half of her right buttock. She kept that injury to herself as she rubbed it with her hand. As she sat with her eyes closed admiring Kanami's gentle touch, it abruptly stopped. Polly sat, almost disappointed, until she then felt something new. She felt two massive pillow-like lips engulf her shoulder. Kanami was kissing her injury. The lips kissed and left a slight residue of saliva and cherry scented lip gloss mingled with the overpowering aroma of alcohol. The new gentle adoration for her hurt shoulder made the tiny blonde flush with warmth. Polly turned around and saw Kanami smiling. They smiled at each other for a moment, Polly's face was glowing with slight arousal from Kanami's show of affection. The teenager was the one who broke the silence.

{"Ow?"} Kanami asked as she looked the doll woman over.

Polly hesitated and then pointed to her upper right buttock. Kanami giggled before her finger and thumb pinched the hem of Polly's dress and lifted. There on Polly's rear was another discoloration of the beginnings of a bruise. Kanami smiled and leaned down and planted her lips on Polly's ass. Polly watched as giant sultry lips took in her entire right buttock. She could feel the breathing from the giant nose so close to her she could kiss it herself, and she wanted to. The lips smacked a kiss leaving the slight pink shade of Kanami's lip gloss on her ass. They both giggled at the sight. The sake was in full effect between both of them.

{"Ow?"} Kanami asked again, wondering if there was somewhere else Polly wanted to give attention to. The teen was beginning to like this game.

Polly sat in Kanami's hand thoroughly conflicted. But the alcohol was winning the argument. The tiny blonde tapped her finger to her lips and blushed. Kanami looked surprised at the little thing's lack of inhibition. But she smiled and lifted her hand to mouth level and slowly came forward with her lips puckered. Polly watched those huge perfect lips advance towards her face and she closed her eyes and leaned forward. Kanami's lips met her small face and would have partially entered the drunk teens mouth had she not pressed into Kanami's plump bottom lip. Polly kissed and lightly sucked on the teen's lip, tasting the cherry lip gloss.

Kanami felt Polly kissing her back and hesitated finishing her kiss. Rather she held her position and allowed the little thing to show her affection by practically making out with her bottom lip. To Kanami it was like allowing the family dog to lick your face. The teen then sucked a bit in response and kissed Polly. When she pulled back she saw remnants of her pink lip gloss like a comical oversized lip stamp. Polly just hung there with her eyes closed and a smile on her face taking in the sensations she just experienced. Kanami took her finger and sucked on it and used the dampness of her saliva to wipe away the pink from Polly's face. The tiny blonde winced and fidgeted as the huge wet fingertip wiped her face clean. When it left she could still smell the cherry mixed with the aroma of sake and it was wonderful.

Kanami returned her hand into Polly's little bedroom and deposited her onto her bed. Almost no words were exchanged between them that night but none needed to be. It reminded Polly of when she first met Miku, although the younger sister knew at least some English. She felt a little sad the teen was ending their night so soon. She also wished she could communicate with her.

Kanami, on the other hand, was cutting it short for a reason. Even in her inebriated state she was aware enough to know she needed to stop. She'd been told, by many of her friends, she tended to get very flirty when she drank. She was already wanting to kiss Polly again, and it was at that moment she knew she needed to distance herself from this little creature. As she watched it get into it's little bed she couldn't help but think, whether it was actually human or not, it was at least pretty cute. She got into bed and she could already feel the night's sake was a bad idea. She was going to feel it in the morning....
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Kanpai!

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kanami woke the next morning, earlier than she thought she ever did without four snooze alarms and complaining. She lay in bed staring at her ceiling feeling a mild headache from the night before. She really wasn't used to drinking. As popular as one would think she was by looking at her she didn't really party all that much. Not like the rest of her friends who saw a sober weekend as something of a personal challenge to over come every week. Her Asian friends thought being in America was exciting and new. All Kanami wanted to do was go back to Japan. She turned her head and saw the little house on her desk and she forced a smile. She almost forgot she had a tiny roommate. Almost. In fact, Polly was probably why she woke so early. Wanting to spend time with her new little marvel. She threw the covers off and sat up swinging her long legs over the side. Her bare feet thudded on the floor more than she thought they would and she cringed at the noise. She glanced at the little house that most likely shook from her footfall. Still quite and no visible movement. She stood and immediately regretted it as she reached her hand out and supported herself with her nearby desk. Her head was heavy and she groaned as she held her hand to her forehead. She crept over to the little house and sat at the desk chair. Peering in she could see Polly sprawled on her bed, leg hanging over the side and the blanket in disarray. She was laying on her stomach and Kanami could see the slow rise and fall of her breathing, so at the very least she didn't die she joked to herself.

"Yosei?" Kanami whispered. Nothing. Her huge hand entered the bedroom, making her grin at how strange it looked amid all the tiny furnishings and occupant. She'd played with dolls when she was younger but now it seemed wondrous seeing a small living person next to her hand. She felt like a giant and snickered a bit. She extended her finger and nudged Polly's form a little. Still nothing but light snoring. "Hmpf…." Kanami huffed. She'd hoped she would wake so they could do something fun in the short time she had her.
